1949.HK.summary: Platt Nera International Limited provides IT integrated solutions and support services to financial institutions, government departments, and agencies primarily in administrative, telecommunications, and utilities sectors in Thailand. Its IT integrated solutions comprise a range of services, including design and planning, assessment of hardware and/or software options, sourcing and sale of hardware and/or software, system installation, and launch to trial operation and maintenance, such as system upgrades for existing systems. The company also provides operational, support, upgrade, and maintenance services to IT system. Platt Nera International Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Platt Nera International Limited is a subsidiary of Pynk Holding Limited.

1FR.SG.summary: Seafresh Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes frozen raw shrimp, processed shrimp, and other seafood products in Thailand and internationally. It provides raw, cooked, sushi, and value added shrimp products, as well as shrimp powder and peeled head shrimp products. The company offers its products under the Seafresh, Sea Angel, GO-GO, Thai Chia, Phoenix, C Angel, and Ultra brands. It is also involved in the import and distribution of seafood; producing and selling animals feed and nutrition; consulting and installation of computer systems; and shrimp farm business. In addition, the company invests in seafood processing companies and other related business. Seafresh Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Mueang Chumphon, Thailand.

1PT1.SG.summary: Central Pattana Public Company Limited develops and manages real estate properties primarily in Thailand. It develops and rents shopping centers, office buildings, condominiums, hotels, and residential buildings; offers property management consulting and corporate services; invests in real estates and leasehold property fund; and sells land and houses, and condominium units. The company also operates play land and water theme park, and hotels; manages real estate investment trust, condominium juristic person, and housing estate juristic person; and provides utility, food center, training, and personnel development services. As of December 31, 2020, its property portfolio comprised 34 shopping centers, 10 office buildings, 2 hotels, and 1 rental residential project. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

1SY.SG.summary: Symphony Communication Public Company Limited provides communication high-speed circuit communication services in Thailand, the Southeast Asian countries, and internationally. The company offers network connectivity services, including private network for branches solution, access network for service provider, and DC/DR connectivity; and internet services, such as direct internet, virtual firewall, DDoS protection, SME broadband internet, internet exchange, and cloud direct connect services. It also provides international network connectivity services comprising international private leased circuit services, IP-virtual private network, E-line/IEPL, and submarine cable systems; and cloud services. Symphony Communication Public Company Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

1TF.SG.summary: Tipco Foods Public Company Limited produces and distributes processed fruits, fresh fruits, fruit juices, vegetable juices, natural mineral water, and ready-to-drink beverages in Thailand. It operates through Products of Vegetable & Fruit, Beverage, and Other segments. The company offers processed fruit products that include canned pineapple, pineapple juice concentrate, canned mixed fruits, aseptic crushed pineapple, pineapple in plastic cup, pineapple in retort pouch, canned tropical fruit salad, tropical fruit salad in plastic cup, canned aloe vera, aseptic crushed aloe vera, aloe vera in retort pouch, coconut milk products, and dehydrated pineapple core and mango, as well as coconut water. It also produces plant and herbal extracts that serve as ingredients for foods, beverages, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and medicines. In addition, the company produces and distributes ready-to-drink fruit juices and vegetable juices; and ready-to-drink beverages. Further, it operates 28 Squeeze Juice Bar by Tipco shops, including 17 company branches and 11 franchise branches that serve smoothies, and healthy drinks and foods. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Thai Pineapple PLC. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

2PR3.F.summary: Pruksa Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, develops and sells residential real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops townhouses, single-detached houses, and condominiums. It also provides management, home decoration, and construction services; and operates hospitals and clinics, as well as place of examination and treatment. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

2PR4.SG.summary: Pruksa Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, develops and sells residential real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops townhouses, single-detached houses, and condominiums. It also provides management, home decoration, and construction services; and operates hospitals and clinics, as well as place of examination and treatment. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

44M.F.summary: Mermaid Maritime Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides subsea and drilling services to the offshore oil and gas industries in Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Thailand, Indonesia, Malaysia, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Subsea Group and Holding. It provides subsea services, including inspection, repair and maintenance, infrastructure installation support, remotely operated vehicle (ROV) support, and cable and flexible pipe laying services through operating 7 subsea vessels, 17 saturation and air diving systems, and 13 ROV systems. The company also offers offshore drilling and accommodation rig services through its ownership in 1 tender assist drilling rig, 1 accommodation barge, and 3 high specification premium jack-up drilling rigs. In addition, it engages in the provision of hydrographic survey and positioning services; diving, ROV, and subsea contracting services; and production and exploration drilling services, as well as in the offshore transportation, installation, and decommissioning business. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Mermaid Maritime Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited.

47T.F.long_name: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited
47T.F.summary: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited provides commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking Business, Securities Business, and Asset Management Business segments. The company accepts deposit products, such as current accounts, savings accounts, fixed deposit accounts, and certificates of deposit, as well as cards and bill payment services. It also provides personal loans, such as home loan, new and used car loans, and loans against inheritance pension; and corporate loans, including project and long term loans, short term loans, and guarantee products. In addition, the company offers investment services, including stock and derivative brokerage, mutual funds, private funds, and provident funds, as well as super savings fund /retirement mutual funds; and insurance services, such as life, retirement, health and critical illness, personal accident, car, and home insurance. Further, it provides investment banking services that financial advisory and underwriting for merger and acquisition, privatization advisory and implementation, project financing, debt restructuring, feasibility study, project valuation, general advisory, etc.; and private banking, and wealth and asset management services. Additionally, the company offers mobile banking, custodian, assets for sale, car auction, hire purchase, and SME lending services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated through a network of 347 branches under the Somwang brand. TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

47TA.F.long_name: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited
47TA.F.summary: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited provides commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking Business, Securities Business, and Asset Management Business segments. The company accepts deposit products, such as current accounts, savings accounts, fixed deposit accounts, and certificates of deposit, as well as cards and bill payment services. It also provides personal loans, such as home loan, new and used car loans, and loans against inheritance pension; and corporate loans, including project and long term loans, short term loans, and guarantee products. In addition, the company offers investment services, including stock and derivative brokerage, mutual funds, private funds, and provident funds, as well as super savings fund /retirement mutual funds; and insurance services, such as life, retirement, health and critical illness, personal accident, car, and home insurance. Further, it provides investment banking services that financial advisory and underwriting for merger and acquisition, privatization advisory and implementation, project financing, debt restructuring, feasibility study, project valuation, general advisory, etc.; and private banking, and wealth and asset management services. Additionally, the company offers mobile banking, custodian, assets for sale, car auction, hire purchase, and SME lending services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated through a network of 347 branches under the Somwang brand. TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

4QVA.F.long_name: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited
4QVA.F.summary: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and petrochemical products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum and Petrochemical Products, Transportation Services, and Other segments. It is also involved in the trading of petroleum for household cooking, industry, and transportation sectors. In addition, the company provides transportation services by land and ship; manufactures and distributes LPG cylinders; and offers warehousing and storage, and oil depots and port services. The company was formerly known as VSPP Development Company Limited. Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

4QVB.SG.long_name: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited
4QVB.SG.summary: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and petrochemical products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum and Petrochemical Products, Transportation Services, and Other segments. It is also involved in the trading of petroleum for household cooking, industry, and transportation sectors. In addition, the company provides transportation services by land and ship; manufactures and distributes LPG cylinders; and offers warehousing and storage, and oil depots and port services. The company was formerly known as VSPP Development Company Limited. Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

5ASA.F.summary: Asiasoft Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision and distribution of online game services in Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, the Philippines, and internationally. It operates through two segments: Online Game and Distribution. The Online Game segment offers online game services through the Internet, which include massive multiplayer online role-playing games, casual games, first person shooting games, and mobile games. The Distribution segment provides payment channel services. The company publishes the games under the PlayPark brand. It also offers @Cafe, which brings online games to Internet cafe gamers, as well as promotional media and various marketing services for its member shops; @Cash that is an in-game credits top-up system; and @Key, a security device for online games services. The company was formerly known as B.M. Media (Thailand) Company Limited. Asiasoft Corporation Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

6DM1.SG.long_name: Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited
6DM1.SG.summary: Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates hospitals. The company owns and manages 6 hospital groups, including Bangkok Hospital Group, Samitivej Hospital Group, BNH Hospital, Phyathai Hospital Group, Paolo Hospital Group, and Royal Hospital Group. It operates regenerative and preventive wellness clinics. In addition, the company operates hotels and restaurant; sells health foods; provides accounting, health insurance, laboratory services, investment, information technology, training, insurance brokerage, air medical transportation, and property management services, as well as asset management services; and manufactures and distributes medicine and pharmaceutical products. Further, it is involved in the e-commerce business. As of December 31, 2020, the company operates 49 hospitals in Thailand and Cambodia. Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

6TI.SG.summary: Frasers Property (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily develops industrial real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops, rents, and sells factories and warehouses, as well as manages 2.8 million square meters of factories and warehouses. It is also involved in the development of commercial and hospitality properties, as well as houses, lands, and mixed-use projects; development of residential properties, including rental and related service of commercial buildings; hotel business; and operation of a golf course. In addition, the company operates and manages serviced apartments, hotels, and office and commercial buildings; and operates as a sponsor and manager of the industrial real estate investment trust in Thailand. Further, it offers data center colocation, smart solutions, investment management, and treasury center development services. The company was formerly known as TICON Industrial Connection Public Company Limited and changed its name to Frasers Property (Thailand) Public Company Limited in January 2019. Frasers Property (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

7BP.F.summary: Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited, an energy company, engages in the refining and marketing of petroleum products. It operates through Refinery and Oil Trading, Marketing, Electricity, Bio-Based Product, Natural Resource, and Other segments. The company explores and produces petroleum, biodiesel, and ethanol; produces electricity through solar, wind, and geothermal; mines lithium; and operates service stations. The company markets its oil products to various sectors, including transportation, aviation, shipping, construction, industrial, and agriculture sectors through oil traders. It operates in Thailand, Malaysia, Japan, Korea, the Philippines, Singapore, Indonesia, Norway, and internationally. The company was formerly known as The Bangchak Petroleum Public Company Limited and changed its name to Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited in April 2017. Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

7BP1.SG.summary: Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited, an energy company, engages in the refining and marketing of petroleum products. It operates through Refinery and Oil Trading, Marketing, Electricity, Bio-Based Product, Natural Resource, and Other segments. The company explores and produces petroleum, biodiesel, and ethanol; produces electricity through solar, wind, and geothermal; mines lithium; and operates service stations. The company markets its oil products to various sectors, including transportation, aviation, shipping, construction, industrial, and agriculture sectors through oil traders. It operates in Thailand, Malaysia, Japan, Korea, the Philippines, Singapore, Indonesia, Norway, and internationally. The company was formerly known as The Bangchak Petroleum Public Company Limited and changed its name to Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited in April 2017. Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

8BCN.SG.short_name: BCPG Public Company Ltd. Reg. S
8BCN.SG.summary: BCPG Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes electric power from renewable resources in Thailand. It generates electricity from solar, wind, geothermal, hydro, and biomass power. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. BCPG Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited.

911622.TW.long_name: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited
911622.TW.summary: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and exports steel wire rods, steel annealing wires, reinforced concrete bars, steel screws, and wire products in Thailand. It also provides spheroidized annealing wires, bolts, and thread rods; and engages in trading activities. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Rayong, Thailand. Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Tycoons Group International Co., Ltd.

9AHN.SG.summary: AAPICO Hitech Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of automobile parts, dies, and jigs in Thailand, China, Malaysia, and Portugal. It operates in three segments: Manufacture of Auto Parts; Sales of Automobiles and Provision of Automobiles Repair Service; and Others. The company offers stamped or pressed parts, including chassis frame components, housing axles parts, pressed and stamped body parts, door check link, and brake lines, fuel lines, engine, and brazing parts; forged and machined parts, such as transmission, power train, steering and suspension systems, engine, shafts, wheel hubs, and other parts, as well as connecting rods and copper forged parts; and plastic parts and plastic fuel tanks. It also provides roof ditch mouldings, belt line mouldings, door sash products, brazed steel tubing, door checks and hinges, and parking brake lever products; assembly jigs; and stamping dies. In addition, the company is involved in the sale of automobiles; provision of automobile repair, training, technical support, and information technology consulting and advisory services; venture capital business; investment in other companies; and import and export of vehicles and parts. Further, it manufactures 3D car navigation and digital map solutions under the POWERMAP brand with voice activation software, as well as Oracle ERP systems; and operates car dealership service centers. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.

9LE.SG.summary: L.P.N. Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops real estate properties in Thailand. It is involved in the development of residential and non-residential condominiums. The company also provides community management services for office and residential condominiums; building engineering services; condominium unit and office space brokerage services; construction management services; and real estate products and services research, development, and consultancy services. In addition, it leases office buildings; and offers security services. L.P.N. Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

A-R.BK.summary: Areeya Property Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops real estate projects in Thailand. It primarily develops single-homes, village towns, townhomes, home offices, and condominiums; and community malls. The company is also involved in the provision of after sales services for property; construction services; and property management services, as well as in the restaurant business. Areeya Property Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

A.BK.summary: Areeya Property Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops real estate projects in Thailand. It primarily develops single-homes, village towns, townhomes, home offices, and condominiums; and community malls. The company is also involved in the provision of after sales services for property; construction services; and property management services, as well as in the restaurant business. Areeya Property Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AAV-R.BK.summary: Asia Aviation Public Company Limited, through its subsidiary, provides airline services primarily in Thailand. The company operates through Scheduled Flight Operations and Charter Flight Operations segments. The Scheduled Flight Operations segment offers passenger air transportation services to routine destinations for scheduled flights. This segment sells tickets through its distribution channels, including website, sale counters, travel agents, etc. The Chartered Flight Operations segment provides passenger air transportation services to non-routine destinations that serves tourist agency companies. Asia Aviation Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AAV.BK.summary: Asia Aviation Public Company Limited, through its subsidiary, provides airline services primarily in Thailand. The company operates through Scheduled Flight Operations and Charter Flight Operations segments. The Scheduled Flight Operations segment offers passenger air transportation services to routine destinations for scheduled flights. This segment sells tickets through its distribution channels, including website, sale counters, travel agents, etc. The Chartered Flight Operations segment provides passenger air transportation services to non-routine destinations that serves tourist agency companies. Asia Aviation Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ABICO-R.BK.summary: Abico Holdings Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes ready-to-drink milk. It is also involved in the rental of office space; and dairy farming business. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

ABICO.BK.summary: Abico Holdings Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes ready-to-drink milk. It is also involved in the rental of office space; and dairy farming business. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

ABM-R.BK.summary: Asia Biomass Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, trades in biomass in Thailand and internationally. The company also manufactures wood chips and biomass pellets. In addition, it provides transportation services. The company was formerly known as Thai Joss Powder Industrial Co., Ltd. Asia Biomass Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ABM.BK.summary: Asia Biomass Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, trades in biomass in Thailand and internationally. The company also manufactures wood chips and biomass pellets. In addition, it provides transportation services. The company was formerly known as Thai Joss Powder Industrial Co., Ltd. Asia Biomass Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ACAP-R.BK.long_name: ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited
ACAP-R.BK.summary: ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited provides corporate and retail lending services in Thailand and the Asian region. The company operates through Lending and Factoring, Call Center Services and Financial Businesses, and Others segments. It also provides non-performing loan servicing on behalf of client creditors, such as front end customer services to borrowers and carrying out day to day administration and accounting of the recovery process, loans accounts, and asset collateral, as well as NPL portfolio valuation services. In addition, the company offers legal advisory and representation services in the areas of business law, real estate law, civil law, bankruptcy law, tax law, and public sector relations; factoring services; and business process outsourcing services comprising call center, debt and receivables collection, loan approval, payroll, and data entry services. Further, it is involved in the sale of land with buildings and other real estate; and provision of investment banking services. The company was formerly known as ACAP Advisory Public Company Limited and changed its name to ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited in February 2016. ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ACAP.BK.long_name: ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited
ACAP.BK.summary: ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited provides corporate and retail lending services in Thailand and the Asian region. The company operates through Lending and Factoring, Call Center Services and Financial Businesses, and Others segments. It also provides non-performing loan servicing on behalf of client creditors, such as front end customer services to borrowers and carrying out day to day administration and accounting of the recovery process, loans accounts, and asset collateral, as well as NPL portfolio valuation services. In addition, the company offers legal advisory and representation services in the areas of business law, real estate law, civil law, bankruptcy law, tax law, and public sector relations; factoring services; and business process outsourcing services comprising call center, debt and receivables collection, loan approval, payroll, and data entry services. Further, it is involved in the sale of land with buildings and other real estate; and provision of investment banking services. The company was formerly known as ACAP Advisory Public Company Limited and changed its name to ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited in February 2016. ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ACC.BK.long_name: Advanced Connection Corporation Public Company Limited
ACC.BK.summary: Advanced Connection Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes ceiling fans in Thailand. The company offers ceiling fans under the Air-Le-Gance, Compass East, and Sunlight brands; and LED decoration lamp under the Lumos brand, as well as accessories. It is also involved in the property development and renting activities. In addition, the company invests in business of electricity production from solar power; operates a solar roof power plant; and engages in the financing and factoring business. The company was formerly known as Compass East Industry (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Advanced Connection Corporation Public Company Limited in November 2015. Advanced Connection Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ACE.BK.long_name: Absolute Clean Energy Public Company Limited
ACE.BK.summary: Absolute Clean Energy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates biomass, municipal solid waste, natural gas, and solar energy power plants in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Biomass Power Plants, Solid Waste Power Plant, Natural Gas Power Plant, and Solar Energy Power Plant. As of December 31, 2020, it has 19 power plants with an installed capacity of 245.91 megawatts. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ACG-R.BK.summary: Autocorp Holding Public Company Limited, a dealer, distributes cars and spare parts in Thailand. It also offers car leasing and insurance services; and maintenance, repair, and after sale services. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Khon Kaen, Thailand.

ACG.BK.summary: Autocorp Holding Public Company Limited, a dealer, distributes cars and spare parts in Thailand. It also offers car leasing and insurance services; and maintenance, repair, and after sale services. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Khon Kaen, Thailand.

ADB.BK.summary: Applied DB Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic compounds, adhesives, and sealants in Thailand, Nigeria, Kenya, Vietnam, Myanmar, Bangladesh, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Plastic Compound, Adhesive, and Silicone and Sealant. The company's plastic compound products include PVC and non-PVC compounds, such as soft PVC, rigid PVC, pharmaceutical grade, and thermoplastic elastomer compounds, as well as PP split yarn for wire and cable fillers. Its adhesive products comprise contact, grafted, PU, vinyl, and emulsion latex water-based adhesives, as well as thinners, primers, and hardeners. The company's sealant products include acetic silicone, neutral silicone, acrylic, super nail construction, PU, and spur polymer hybrid sealants. It also offers DIY products comprising super glues, RTV gasket makers, household adhesive and sealants, epoxy adhesive and putties, and specialist products. The company provides its products to wire and cable, real estate and construction, and shoes and leather industries, as well as household end-users. Applied DB Public Company Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

ADVANC.BK.long_name: Advanced Info Service Public Company Limited
ADVANC.BK.summary: Advanced Info Service Public Company Limited, together its subsidiaries, provides mobile network, fixed broadband, and digital services primarily in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Mobile Phone Services, Mobile Phone and Equipment Sales, and Datanet and Broadband Services. It is involved in the operation of cellular telephone networks in the frequency of 700 MHz, 900 MHz, 1800 MHz, 2100 MHz, and 2600 MHz frequencies. The company also imports and distributes handsets and accessories, as well as distributes cash cards; and provides online data communications services through telephone landlines and optical fiber, as well as electronic payment services. In addition, it provides international telephone service, broadcasting network, and television broadcasting services for various channels, as well as insurance brokerage services. Further, the company offers IT system, content aggregator, and billing and collection outsourcing services; call center services; and land and building rental services, as well as related facilities. Additionally, it provides internet data center, and internet and satellite uplink-downlink services for communications; and distributes internet equipment; publishes business telephone directories and advertising; offers mobile contents; and provides online advertising services. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AE3.SG.long_name: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited
AE3.SG.summary: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides various retail finance services in Thailand. The company operates through Retail Finance Services and Other Business segments. It offers credit card services, hire purchase services, personal loans, and other loans, as well as cash and installment loans. The company also provides debt collection services; and insurance brokerage services. As of February 29, 2020, it had 105 branches. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AEC.BK.summary: AEC Securities Public Company Limited provides securities brokerage services to individual and institutional investors in Thailand. It offers equity services, such as cash account, cash balance account, and credit balance account; securities trading and underwriting; investment advisory; derivatives brokerage; securities borrowing and lending; private fund management; mutual funds; block trade; bonds; securities analysis; and investment banking services, including securities design and offering, debt restructuring, merger, and financial advisory services. The company was formerly known as United Securities Public Company Limited and changed its name to AEC Securities Public Company Limited in June 2013. AEC Securities Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1971 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AEONTS-R.BK.long_name: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited
AEONTS-R.BK.summary: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides various retail finance services in Thailand. The company operates through Retail Finance Services and Other Business segments. It offers credit card services, hire purchase services, personal loans, and other loans, as well as cash and installment loans. The company also provides debt collection services; and insurance brokerage services. As of February 29, 2020, it had 105 branches. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AEONTS.BK.long_name: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited
AEONTS.BK.summary: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides various retail finance services in Thailand. The company operates through Retail Finance Services and Other Business segments. It offers credit card services, hire purchase services, personal loans, and other loans, as well as cash and installment loans. The company also provides debt collection services; and insurance brokerage services. As of February 29, 2020, it had 105 branches. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AF-R.BK.summary: AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited provides receivable factoring services to small and middle businesses in Thailand. It offers short-term financing services for various industries, including electronic equipment and parts, telecommunication, consumer products, and health and beauty. The company was formerly known as Dhanamitr Factoring PLC and changed its name to AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited in September 2011. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of AIRA Capital Public Company Limited.

AF.BK.summary: AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited provides receivable factoring services to small and middle businesses in Thailand. It offers short-term financing services for various industries, including electronic equipment and parts, telecommunication, consumer products, and health and beauty. The company was formerly known as Dhanamitr Factoring PLC and changed its name to AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited in September 2011. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of AIRA Capital Public Company Limited.

AFC.BK.summary: Asia Fiber Public Company Limited manufactures and sells nylon products in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Nylon Chip, Filament Yarn, Textured Yarn, and Other. It offers nylon chips, nylon filament yarns, nylon textured yarns, nylon taffeta fabrics, grey fabrics, and dyed and finished fabrics, as well as provides other services. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AGE.BK.long_name: Asia Green Energy Public Company Limited
AGE.BK.summary: Asia Green Energy Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of coal for industrial use in Thailand. It also provides transportation and management, water transportation and port, and cargo services, as well as consultancy services for coal extraction and water transportation. In addition, the company generates and supplies electricity; and distributes fuel. It also imports and exports coal. It serves power plants, steel plants, cement plants, and paper factories; and industrial factories relating to textile, food, rubber, and alternative energy products. The company exports coal to China, India, Vietnam, and Taiwan. Asia Green Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AH-R.BK.summary: AAPICO Hitech Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of automobile parts, dies, and jigs in Thailand, China, Malaysia, and Portugal. It operates in three segments: Manufacture of Auto Parts; Sales of Automobiles and Provision of Automobiles Repair Service; and Others. The company offers stamped or pressed parts, including chassis frame components, housing axles parts, pressed and stamped body parts, door check link, and brake lines, fuel lines, engine, and brazing parts; forged and machined parts, such as transmission, power train, steering and suspension systems, engine, shafts, wheel hubs, and other parts, as well as connecting rods and copper forged parts; and plastic parts and plastic fuel tanks. It also provides roof ditch mouldings, belt line mouldings, door sash products, brazed steel tubing, door checks and hinges, and parking brake lever products; assembly jigs; and stamping dies. In addition, the company is involved in the sale of automobiles; provision of automobile repair, training, technical support, and information technology consulting and advisory services; venture capital business; investment in other companies; and import and export of vehicles and parts. Further, it manufactures 3D car navigation and digital map solutions under the POWERMAP brand with voice activation software, as well as Oracle ERP systems; and operates car dealership service centers. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.

AH.BK.summary: AAPICO Hitech Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of automobile parts, dies, and jigs in Thailand, China, Malaysia, and Portugal. It operates in three segments: Manufacture of Auto Parts; Sales of Automobiles and Provision of Automobiles Repair Service; and Others. The company offers stamped or pressed parts, including chassis frame components, housing axles parts, pressed and stamped body parts, door check link, and brake lines, fuel lines, engine, and brazing parts; forged and machined parts, such as transmission, power train, steering and suspension systems, engine, shafts, wheel hubs, and other parts, as well as connecting rods and copper forged parts; and plastic parts and plastic fuel tanks. It also provides roof ditch mouldings, belt line mouldings, door sash products, brazed steel tubing, door checks and hinges, and parking brake lever products; assembly jigs; and stamping dies. In addition, the company is involved in the sale of automobiles; provision of automobile repair, training, technical support, and information technology consulting and advisory services; venture capital business; investment in other companies; and import and export of vehicles and parts. Further, it manufactures 3D car navigation and digital map solutions under the POWERMAP brand with voice activation software, as well as Oracle ERP systems; and operates car dealership service centers. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.

AHC-R.BK.summary: Aikchol Hospital Public Company Limited provides medical and nursing care services under the Aikchol Hospital trademark in Thailand. The company offers hospital services, including diseases protection, medical treatment, health strengthening, and health rehabilitation services with 340 beds in service. It serves primarily individuals, group of policyholders of the insurance company, group of contract parties' company, and group of insured on social security. Aikchol Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

AHC.BK.summary: Aikchol Hospital Public Company Limited provides medical and nursing care services under the Aikchol Hospital trademark in Thailand. The company offers hospital services, including diseases protection, medical treatment, health strengthening, and health rehabilitation services with 340 beds in service. AI.BK.summary: Asian Insulators Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes porcelain insulators products for electricity distribution and transmission lines. It offers spool, strain, line post type, pin post type, suspension, station post type, cleat, porcelain, and horizontal mounting solid core line post insulators; and underground cable support products. The company provides services for design, supply, and installation of high voltage substation, distribution, and transmission line systems; and project management, industrial maintenance, construction, and engineering services to the water, power, and communications industries. It is also involved in producing and distributing biodiesel, vegetable oil, and other fuel oil; and exporting vegetable oil under the Pamola brand. In addition, the company offers local and overseas logistics services for passenger, merchandise, parcel, and other materials; and ports and rental tank farms services. Further, it trades in electrical equipment. Asian Insulators Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIE.BK.summary: AI Energy Public Company Limited produces and distributes bio diesel, and vegetable/animal oil and fats. The company also offers refined glycerin; and palm fatty acid distillate and glycerin pitch, as well as domestic and international logistics services for passengers, merchandise, parcels, and other materials. It also provides port and terminal services; and storage tank farm rental services. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Samut Sakhon, Thailand. AI Energy Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Asian Insulators Public Company Limited.

AIMIRT.BK.long_name: AIM Industrial Growth Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
AIMIRT.BK.summary: AIM Industrial Growth Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust focuses on investing in freehold right of land, cold storage buildings, and immovable assets related to cold storage and warehouses in Thailand. These are located in Samut Sakhon and Chachoengsao areas with total leasable area of 36,908.00 sq.m. It also intends to invest in freehold right of land and warehouses, including 5 units of warehouses with total leasable area of 21,651 sq.m. in Bang Phi, Samut Prakan. The company is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIPUY.long_name: Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited
AIPUY.summary: Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited engages in developing, managing, and operating international airports in Thailand. The company operates through Airport Business, Hotel Business, Ground Aviation Services, and Security Business segments. It operates six international airports, including Suvarnabhumi, Don Mueang, Chiang Mai, Hat Yai, Phuket, and Mae Fah Luang Chiang Rai airports. The company is also involved in the hotel and restaurant business; and services or rental of ground equipment, as well as provides security services. Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited was founded in 1903 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIRA-R.BK.summary: AIRA Capital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides financial advisory services in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Securities and Investment, Advisory and Investment Banking, Factoring, and Rental and Service. The company offers securities brokerage, securities trading, investment advisory, securities underwriting, securities borrowing and lending, derivatives brokerage, and private fund management services. It also provides investment banking services, including mergers and acquisitions, such as asset/company valuation, leverage buyout, and joint ventures and spin-offs; and capital restructurings and other financial advisory services to small and medium-sized enterprises, public and privately-owned companies, government related entities, and private equity firms. In addition, the company provides mergers and acquisitions advisory services, hire purchase, finance lease, and operating lease for industrial equipment and machines; and private fund, mutual fund management, and securities brokerage of investment units services. Further, it engages in receivable factoring, venture capital, property development, and asset management businesses. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIRA.BK.summary: AIRA Capital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides financial advisory services in Thailand. AISF.F.long_name: Advanced Info Service Public Company Limited
AISF.F.summary: Advanced Info Service Public Company Limited, together its subsidiaries, provides mobile network, fixed broadband, and digital services primarily in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Mobile Phone Services, Mobile Phone and Equipment Sales, and Datanet and Broadband Services. It is involved in the operation of cellular telephone networks in the frequency of 700 MHz, 900 MHz, 1800 MHz, 2100 MHz, and 2600 MHz frequencies. The company also imports and distributes handsets and accessories, as well as distributes cash cards; and provides online data communications services through telephone landlines and optical fiber, as well as electronic payment services. In addition, it provides international telephone service, broadcasting network, and television broadcasting services for various channels, as well as insurance brokerage services. Further, the company offers IT system, content aggregator, and billing and collection outsourcing services; call center services; and land and building rental services, as well as related facilities. Additionally, it provides internet data center, and internet and satellite uplink-downlink services for communications; and distributes internet equipment; publishes business telephone directories and advertising; offers mobile contents; and provides online advertising services. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIT.BK.long_name: Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited
AIT.BK.summary: Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, sells, installs, services, repairs, maintains, and trains information and communication technology network systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Sales and Service, and Rental of Equipment. It provides solutions, including carrier grade router/switch, Web/video caching, DDOS protection, software-defined networking or the network controlled by the program to work as defined, network function virtualization, and other. The company also offers data center and cloud solutions, such as consolidation and virtualization, unified data center, converged and hyper converged infrastructure, private and public cloud infrastructure, software-defined networking or the network controlled by the program, and other. In addition, it provides collaboration solutions comprising communication through IP/VoIP system or unified communication, video and Web conferencing, contact center, and others; and various enterprise network solutions consisting of router, switch, wireless LAN, WAN optimization, security, application delivery control, DNS server, identity system, network management, and other. Further, the company offers the services in the development of information technology systems to various projects with the combination of concepts in applying technology with the framework in developing the system accordingly. Additionally, it provides managed services managing complicated IT system; and maintenance service on checking the operational condition of the system, which enables the system to operate continually and reduce the downtime period, and preventing problem to occur simultaneously, as well as spare parts for saving the time in solving the problem and mitigating the risks from the damage of equipment. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AJ-R.BK.summary: A.J. Plast Public Company Limited manufactures, sells, and exports plastic films and scrap products in Thailand and internationally. It offers biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP), biaxially oriented polyester (BOPET), biaxially oriented polyamide (BOPA), biaxially oriented poly lactic acid (BOPLA), and cast polypropylene (CPP) films, as well as metallized BOPP, BOPET, BOPA, BOPLA, and CPP films; and Krystalox and Krystalent films. The company's products are primarily used in printed and flexible packaging, industrial, lamination and adhesive tape, and wrapping applications. A.J. Plast Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AJA-R.BK.summary: AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail of electric appliances under the AJ brand in Thailand. It retails and wholesales audio and visual products, home appliances, mobile phones, and accessories. The company also provides top-up services for prepaid phone and service prepaid kiosks. In addition, it is also involved in the distribution of sport shoes; retail of top-up machines; logistic and export business, including TV drama programs and other entertainment media businesses; and provision of e-money services and accept payment through electronic methods. The company was formerly known as Crown Tech Advance Public Company Limited and changed its sport shoes name to AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited in June 2017. AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AKP-R.BK.summary: Akkhie Prakarn Public Company Limited manages and operates industrial waste management centers in Thailand. The company is involved in the provision of services on incinerating and destroying rubbish, wastes, and used materials, as well as recycles rubbish and wastes to substituted energy and raw materials. It also offers pollution control system to prevent the emission of pollutants generated from hazardous substance incineration; a system for monitoring and inspecting the amount of pollutants released from the chimney; hazardous waste quality improvement systems; laboratory for hazardous waste analysis; and waste transportation system. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand. Akkhie Prakarn Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Better World Green Public Company Limited.

It also distributes solar cells and solar panel; and engages in the solar electric power business. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ALL.BK.long_name: All Inspire Development Public Company Limited
ALL.BK.summary: All Inspire Development Public Company Limited engages in the development of real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops condominiums and townhomes. It also provides condominium management and real estate brokerage services. In addition, the company engages in the leasing and rental of shopping malls. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ALLA.BK.summary: Alla Public Company Limited imports and distributes cranes and electric hoists, industrial doors, and relevant parts and other equipment in Thailand. It also offers dock levelers and dock shelters; overhead sectional, high speed, traffic, fire, and cold doors; roller shutters; wheel and vehicle restraint, traffic light, loading dock light and fan kit, and rubber bumper products; warehouse systems, including warehouse management systems and accessories, automated sorting and retrieving systems, warehouse control systems, transportation systems, conveyors, picking and sorting systems, racking systems, high volume low speed fans, and warehouse LED systems; and plastic strip curtains. The company also provides installation and after-sales services. It serves construction, automobile, chemical, power plant, steel, cement, logistics, airport, and government projects. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ALLY.BK.long_name: Ally Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
ALLY.BK.summary: Bualuang K.E.Retail Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust specializes in real estate investments.

ALT.BK.summary: ALT Telecom Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture, installation, maintenance, rental, and sale of telecommunication network equipment in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Network Equipment and Electricity Meter Distribution, Network Equipment Installation Business, and Network Equipment Rental Business. The company also manufactures, assembles, installs, and distributes electricity meter; and offers telecommunication products comprising fiber optic cables, telecom shelters, antennas, batteries, and other telecommunication equipment, as well as rapid deployment products. In addition, it is involved in the construction of base stations; installation of equipment and optical fiber cables; lease and management of telecommunication basic structures; and sale, installation, and maintenance of electrical equipment and systems. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bang Kruay, Thailand.

ALUCON-R.BK.summary: Alucon Public Company Limited produces and distributes aluminum containers primarily in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Can and Tube, and Slug. It offers aluminum collapsible tubes, monobloc aerosol cans, bottles, and rigid wall containers, as well as marker pen bodies. The company also provides aluminum slugs for impact extrusion; and technical impact extrusions, blank aluminum slugs, aluminum coils, aluminum pellets, strips, plates, etc. Its products are used for hair color products, medical creams, adhesives, etc. The company exports its products to approximately 40 countries, including Japan, Australia, the United States, Indonesia, and South Africa. Alucon Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

AMA.BK.summary: Ama Marine Public Company Limited engages in marine transportation business in Southeast Asia regions, China, India, and Thailand. It operates through two segments, Marine Transportation and Logistic Services. The company owns and operates a fleet of 10 tankers that has a total capacity of 91,443 DWT to transport palm oil, vegetable oil, and others chemicals. It also transports petrol, bio diesel, and vegetable oil through operating 216 trucks and semi-trailers in Thailand. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AMANAH-R.BK.summary: Amanah Leasing Public Company Limited provides hire purchase, financial and operating lease, and inventory finance services to consumers and corporates in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Hire Purchase and Others. It also offers used car, auto, and auto SME financing services, as well as auto to money services. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 43 branches. The company was formerly known as Nava Leasing Public Company Limited and changed its name to Amanah Leasing Public Company Limited in October 2010. Amanah Leasing Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AMARIN-R.BK.long_name: Amarin Printing and Publishing Public Company Limited
AMARIN-R.BK.summary: Amarin Printing and Publishing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the publishing, advertising, and publications distribution businesses in Thailand. It offers a range of printing services, such as artwork creative design, photography, image retouching, and digital printing services, as well as packaging printing service. The company also conceptualizes, compiles, designs, publishes, and delivers offline content, including books, magazines/newsletters, cards/leaflets/brochures/posters, annual reports, anniversary books, pocket books, and gifts; online content, which include e-books, video clips, websites, and applications, as well as augmented reality and social network content; and visual content comprising infographics, illustrations, picture, and photography content. In addition, it engages in the organization of events, fairs, and seminars, as well as offsite training programs for private companies and SMEs; purchase, procurement, lease, and leasehold of various assets; and production, distribution, retail, and wholesale of various publication formats that include Thai and translated foreign language books, Praew and Sudsapda magazines for women, electronic creative media comprising video and multimedia teaching materials, and other printed materials. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 139 bookstores under the Nai-In name. The company was formerly known as Amarin Printing Group Company Limited and changed its name to Amarin Printing and Publishing Public Company Limited in 1993. Amarin Printing and Publishing Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It also produces, distributes, and treats water for industrial use; provides management services in common area; operates a school; and constructs factory for rent. In addition, the company operates as a REIT manager. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company also trades in round-bars and deformed-bars, as well as square and round steel tubes. In addition, it provides steel cutting and modifying services. APCO-R.BK.summary: Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited engages in the research and development, manufacture, and distribution of health and natural beauty products in Thailand. Its products include dietary supplements, cosmetics, and personal care products that are developed from natural plant and botanical extracts. The company also provides slimming, anti-wrinkle and anti-spots, skin care, and fat reduction products, as well as products for balancing immunity. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Natural Cosmetics Research Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited in July 2005. Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Lamphun, Thailand.

The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

APEX.BK.summary: Apex Development Public Company Limited develops and sells real estate properties. The company develops residential condominiums, villas, and hotels, as well as land. It also provides services for customers to operate apartments and villas for rent. The company was formerly known as Sun Tech Group Public Company Limited and changed its name to Apex Development Public Company Limited in August 2007. Apex Development Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

APP-R.BK.summary: Applicad Public Company Limited sells computer programs and provides maintenance services for computer programs. The company offers computer software for engineering, construction, and architecture services; computer and spare parts; and machines and equipment, as well as materials and other products. It offers education solution and other related services, as well as designs and manufactures industrial parts and prototypes. In addition, the company distributes AutoCAD drawing, 3D pipe drawing, and 3D software in industrial design. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

In addition, the company distributes AutoCAD drawing, 3D pipe drawing, and 3D software in industrial design. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

APTPF.long_name: Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited
APTPF.summary: Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited engages in developing, managing, and operating international airports in Thailand. The company operates through Airport Business, Hotel Business, Ground Aviation Services, and Security Business segments. It operates six international airports, including Suvarnabhumi, Don Mueang, Chiang Mai, Hat Yai, Phuket, and Mae Fah Luang Chiang Rai airports. The company is also involved in the hotel and restaurant business; and services or rental of ground equipment, as well as provides security services. Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited was founded in 1903 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

APURE-R.BK.summary: Agripure Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes agro products in Thailand. The company offers canned and pouched sweet corn products; fresh vegetable and fruit products; and commercial seeds, as well as breeds and distributes corn seeds. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

APURE.BK.summary: Agripure Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes agro products in Thailand. The company offers canned and pouched sweet corn products; fresh vegetable and fruit products; and commercial seeds, as well as breeds and distributes corn seeds. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

AQ.BK.summary: AQ Estate Public Company Limited acquires, develops, and sells properties in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Property Development Low Rise, Property Development High Rise, Services, and Property Rental and Service. The company provides recreational and sale management services; operates hotels and resorts; manages commercial space; and provides real estate trading and rental services. The company was formerly known as Krisdamahanakorn Public Company Limited and changed its name to AQ Estate Public Company Limited in April 2014. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AQUA.BK.summary: Aqua Corporation Public Company Limited primarily rents space for advertising signage in Bangkok. The company operates through Rental Space for Advertising Signage; and Service and Investment Property Lease segments. It provides real estate rental services; warehouse rental services; and structured billboard stand rental and advertising services. The company was formerly known as P Plus P Public Company Limited and changed its name to Aqua Corporation Public Company Limited in April 2012. Aqua Corporation Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ARIN-R.BK.summary: Arinsiri Land Public company limited engages in the property development activities in Thailand. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Chonburi, Thailand.

ARIN.BK.summary: Arinsiri Land Public company limited engages in the property development activities in Thailand. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Chonburi, Thailand.

ARIP-R.BK.summary: ARIP Public Company Limited engages in the management of events and marketing activities in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Media and Contents, Management of Event, and Digital Service. The company sells and distributes advertising spaces and services on traditional media, digital media, and online social media in the fields of business, management, and information communication technologies (ICT), including Business+, a magazine that provides analysis on the economy, business, management strategy, administration, marketing, and business trend updates; Business+ Top 1000 Companies, a magazine that compiles business information of the registered companies in Thailand to list the top 1,000 companies with the highest revenue; and COMTODAY or techhub.in.th, an ICT and consumer electronics knowledge source. It also organizes IT exhibitions and trade shows, as well as offers comprehensive event management and integrated marketing services service for conventions and exhibitions under the COMMART name. In addition, it offers digital marketing and consultant services, such as online marketing strategy, branding communication through digital media, online communication strategy, content marketing strategy, creative content, online content management, data analytic and reports, and online media plan and buying media, including achievement measurement; and enterprise learning platform, an online training platform using cloud technology. Further, the company engages in the production of e-books, advertisements, and content in digital media; production and distribution of IT-related publications; and placement of advertisements. ARIP Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ARROW-R.BK.summary: Arrow Syndicate Public Company Limited manufactures and sells various conduits in construction and building; electrical conduits; and PPR pipings for water treatment systems in Thailand. The company offers electrical conduits, such as pipe, intermediate metallic, rigid steel, squarelocked and interlocked flexible metallic, and liquid tight flexible metallic conduits, as well as electrical metallic tubings; hot and cool water pipes and fittings; air ducts, including spiral, long seam, wind-flex, flexible metal, rectangular, and post-tensioned ducts; and reinforced thermosetting resin conduits. It also manufactures and produces air cooling conduits, as well as operates as a contractor for electrical systems. In addition, the company engages in the business design technology development software and computer business. It exports its products to Australia, Japan, the United States, Turkey, the Philippines, Singapore, Indonesia, Vietnam, Egypt, Myanmar, Malaysia, Cambodia, and Saudi Arabia. The company was formerly known as J.S.V. Hardware Company Limited and changed its name to Arrow Syndicate Public Company Limited in August 2012. Arrow Syndicate Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

AS-R.BK.summary: Asiasoft Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision and distribution of online game services in Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, the Philippines, and internationally. It operates through two segments: Online Game and Distribution. The Online Game segment offers online game services through the Internet, which include massive multiplayer online role-playing games, casual games, first person shooting games, and mobile games. The Distribution segment provides payment channel services. The company publishes the games under the PlayPark brand. It also offers @Cafe, which brings online games to Internet cafe gamers, as well as promotional media and various marketing services for its member shops; @Cash that is an in-game credits top-up system; and @Key, a security device for online games services. The company was formerly known as B.M. Media (Thailand) Company Limited. Asiasoft Corporation Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AS.BK.summary: Asiasoft Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision and distribution of online game services in Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, the Philippines, and internationally. ASAP-R.BK.long_name: Synergetic Auto Performance Public Company Limited
ASAP-R.BK.summary: Synergetic Auto Performance Public Company Limited provides car rental services in Thailand. The company offers operating leasing services for corporate customers; short-term car rental services for ordinary customers; limousine rental services for corporate customers; and car rental services through an asap application. It also operates Lifestyle Mall, a car rental center and complete used cars, which include food and beverage outlets; and asap select franchises that are service centers for short-term car rentals and second-hand car sales. In addition, the company provides car maintenance services. It offers services under asap brand name. Synergetic Auto Performance Public Company Limited is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

ASAP.BK.long_name: Synergetic Auto Performance Public Company Limited

It also operates Lifestyle Mall, a car rental center and complete used cars, which include food and beverage outlets; and asap select franchises that are service centers for short-term car rentals and second-hand car sales. In addition, the company provides car maintenance services. It offers services under asap brand name. Synergetic Auto Performance Public Company Limited is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

ASEFA-R.BK.summary: Asefa Public Company Limited manufactures and provides electrical power distribution, switchboard, trunking, lighting, automation, and energy solutions in Thailand. The company manufactures and sells modular and licensed type tested switchboards, metal trunking and ladders, luminaire products, metal sheet fabrication, and prefabricated mobile units under the ASEFA brand. It also distributes and supplies electrical and control, electrical power distribution, lighting and equipment, energy conservation and renewable energy, cable and accessories, and other products. In addition, the company offers system integration services, such as building automation, chiller management, industrial automation, lighting control and management, energy management, and power quality improvement; and engineering services comprising electrical power distribution, renewable energy, energy conservation, automation and smart control, pumping stations, electrical communications, data center, and others, as well as after sales services. It serves infrastructure, industry, commercial building, residential, healthcare, data center and telecommunication, and power generation sectors. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

ASIA.BK.summary: Asia Hotel Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hotel and restaurant business in Thailand and internationally. The company is also involved in the rental of a shopping center and hotel; and provision of utility, security, and cleaning services. Asia Hotel Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1964 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ASIAN.BK.long_name: Asian Sea Corporation Public Company Limited
ASIAN.BK.summary: Asian Sea Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells processed frozen seafood products in Thailand, the United States, Japan, Italy, the United Kingdom, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Frozen and Canned Food Products, Feed Stuff, and Other Business. Its products include frozen shrimp, tuna, sillago, and frozen squid products. The company also produces ready-to-cook or ready-to-eat processed seafood products; ready-to-eat products packed in cans, pouches, or plastic cups, such as fried rice, pasta, and tuna in curry sauce; pet food products; and aquaculture feed pellets. In addition, it produces animal feed, fishmeal, and feedstuff; distributes frozen seafood; and provides cold storage services, as well as is involved in the marketing and management activities. The company offers its products under the ASIAN FEED, Monchou, A.S.S., Blue Chef, Asian Surat, SAKURA, TCC, KIKU, Hero, Victor, Allstar, Rambo, SuperHero, Ruay Puan, and Faster brand names. Asian Sea Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

ASIMAR-R.BK.long_name: Asian Marine Services Public Company Limited
ASIMAR-R.BK.summary: Asian Marine Services Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the ship building and ship repairing businesses in Thailand. The company constructs various types of ships; undertakes ship conversion projects; and offers a range of offshore support services, and engineering services. It also operates as an agent of machinery and equipment for marine service; and subcontractor of ship repair, as well as provides pollution control and environmental management services. The company was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Samutprakan, Thailand.

ASIMAR.BK.long_name: Asian Marine Services Public Company Limited
ASIMAR.BK.summary: Asian Marine Services Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the ship building and ship repairing businesses in Thailand. The company constructs various types of ships; undertakes ship conversion projects; and offers a range of offshore support services, and engineering services. It also operates as an agent of machinery and equipment for marine service; and subcontractor of ship repair, as well as provides pollution control and environmental management services. The company was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Samutprakan, Thailand.

ASK-R.BK.long_name: Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited
ASK-R.BK.summary: Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited provides auto hire purchase services primarily in Thailand. It operates through five segments: Hire Purchase, Leasing, Loan, Factoring, and Insurance Broker. The company provides automobile hire purchase services for new and used automobiles, including passenger and commercial cars, such as pickup, van, truck and taxi, etc.; auto and machine leasing services for commercial customers; personal loans, sale and hire purchase back, and floor plan financing to hire purchase customers and automotive dealers; and factoring services to commercial customers in various industries. It also offers insurance brokerage services, including car, fire, marine, personal accident, and third party liability insurance to hire purchase and finance lease customers; and auto registrations and transfers, and tax renewal services. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Chailease Holding Company Limited.

The company provides automobile hire purchase services for new and used automobiles, including passenger and commercial cars, such as pickup, van, truck and taxi, etc.; auto and machine leasing services for commercial customers; personal loans, sale and hire purchase back, and floor plan financing to hire purchase customers and automotive dealers; and factoring services to commercial customers in various industries. It also offers insurance brokerage services, including car, fire, marine, personal accident, and third party liability insurance to hire purchase and finance lease customers; and auto registrations and transfers, and tax renewal services. ASN.BK.summary: ASN Broker Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides insurance brokerage services in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Non-Life Insurance Broker, Life Insurance Broker, and Peer-to-Peer Lending Platform Service. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ASP.BK.long_name: Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited
ASP.BK.summary: Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. The company operates in four segments: Securities and Derivatives Brokerage, Investment Banking, Fund Management, and Investment Trading. The company provides securities and derivatives brokering and dealing services for local and foreign investors; investment and derivative advisory; security underwriting; securities borrowing and lending; venture capital management; and private, derivatives, and mutual fund management services, as well as act as a financial advisor for the issuance and public offering of securities. It also offers investment banking services, such as mergers and acquisitions advisory, debt and corporate restructuring, and valuation services for shares, as well as invests in unit trusts and buys, sells, and exchanges securities. The company was formerly known as Asia Plus Group Holdings Securities Public Company Limited and changed its name to Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited in July 2015. Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ASW-R.BK.summary: Asset Wise Public Company Limited develops residential real estate properties in Thailand. It develops residential condominiums, condominiums, and low-rise real estate projects consisting of detached houses, townhomes, and home offices. The company also rents real estate properties. Asset Wise Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ASW.BK.summary: Asset Wise Public Company Limited develops residential real estate properties in Thailand. It develops residential condominiums, condominiums, and low-rise real estate projects consisting of detached houses, townhomes, and home offices. The company also rents real estate properties. Asset Wise Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ATP30-R.BK.summary: ATP 30 Public Company Limited provides transport services in Thailand. The company offers shuttle services to factory employees of industrial estate. As of December 31, 2020, it owned and operated 347 vehicles, including 211 buses, 38 mini-buses, 91 vans, and 7 VIP vans, as well as 66 affiliated vehicles comprising 61 vans and 5 buses. The company was formerly known as Amata Transport 30 Limited Company. ATP 30 Public Company Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.
