SAPPE-R.BK.summary: Sappe Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes healthy food and beverage products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers functional drinks under the Sappe Beauti Drink, Sappe Beauti Shot, and St. Anna brands; fruit-flavored vitamin water under the B'lue Water brand; fruit-flavored drinks with aloe vera flesh under the Sappe Aloe Vera Drink brand; fruit and ready-to-drink vegetable juices under the Sappe For One Day brand; juices with coconut jelly under the Mogu Mogu brand; and aromatic coconut water under the All Coco brand. It also provides ready-to-drink coffee powder under the Preaw Coffee and SlimFit Coffee; chlorophyll powder under the Preaw Chlorophyll; and dietary supplement powders under the Sappe Beauti Powder brands. In addition, the company offers jelly for health and beauty purpose under the Beauti Jelly; grilled fish snacks under the ZeaMax; shrimp snacks under the Chimdii; jelly format product for men under the Maxtive; and organic soy pudding under the DeNosh brands, as well as imports, exports, and distributes goods. The company was formerly known as Sapanan General Food Company Limited and changed its name to Sappe Public Company Limited in September 2013. Sappe Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAT-R.BK.long_name: Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited
SAT-R.BK.summary: Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells pick-up axles and truck trunnion shafts in Thailand. It offers axle shafts, disc and drum brakes, leaf and coil springs, stabilizer bars, exhaust manifolds, hot coil springs, and other products. The company also provides its parts for passenger cars, pick-ups, and trucks, as well as for the agriculture machinery industry. In addition, it rents and invests in real estate. The company serves original equipment manufacturers and replacement equipment manufacturers. Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

SAUCE-R.BK.summary: Thaitheparos Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes sauces and condiments in Thailand and internationally. It offers seasoning food products under the Golden Mountain brand, including seasoning sauces, chilli sauces, distilled vinegar products, chilli and tomato sauces, tomato ketchups, and oyster sauces, as well as fermented soy sauces and powdering sauces, and fermented soy sauce powders; chilli sauces under the Sriraja Panich brand; and Japanese soy sauce under the Kinzan Shoyu brand. The company was formerly known as Thai Theparos Food Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thaitheparos Public Company Limited in April 2011. Thaitheparos Public Company Limited was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

SAWAD-R.BK.summary: Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides finance services in Thailand. It offers hire-purchase and loan, and non-performing assets management services. The company also invests in other companies; and provides management and consulting services for retail credit systems in local and foreign countries, as well as credit sale in foreign countries. In addition, it provides digital personal loan services. The company was formerly known as Srisawad Power 1979 Public Company Limited and changed its name to Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited in July 2017. Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAWANG-R.BK.summary: Sawang Export Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of precious stones and jewelry in Thailand, Europe, Australia, the United States, and internationally. The company offers jewelry accessories, including rings, pendants, earrings, and necklaces made with 8k, 9k, 10k, 14k, and 18k gold or silver consisting of diamond and color stones. It also provides diamond, precious, semi-precious, and created stones; color stones, such as rubies, and natural blue and yellow sapphires, as well as synthetic stones; and gold and silver jewelry sets. The company offers its products through department and online stores under the Beawelry and Silver Star 7 brands. It also exports its products. Sawang Export Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1972 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SC.BK.long_name: SC Asset Corporation Public Company Limited
SC.BK.summary: SC Asset Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a real estate development company in Thailand. It operates through Real Estates sales; Rental and Rendering of Services; and Consulting and Management Service segments. The company develops and sells single detached houses, townhomes, and condominiums, as well as home offices; and rents office and technical buildings. It also provides consulting and management services. The company was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCB.BK.long_name: The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited
SCB.BK.summary: The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited provides various financial products and services. It operates in four segments: Corporate, SME, Retail, and Insurance. The company offers deposit products, such as savings, current, fixed deposit, long term deposit, foreign currency, and E passbook deposit accounts; home, car, personal, and mortgage loans; debit, prepaid, and credit cards; investment products comprising mutual funds, debentures, bonds, and other investments; accident, savings, health expense, income protection, heritage and life protection, travel, motor, property, unit linked, and other insurance products; and various payment services. It also provides credit facilities, such as overdrafts, promissory notes, clean bill discounts, long term loans, letter of guarantee, standby letter of credit, and acceptance/Aval; financial advisory and merger acquisition services; fixed income instrument and underwriting services; structured and project finance services; and foreign exchange and interest rate risk management services. In addition, the company offers business collection, business payments, and bank accounts and liquidity management solutions; corporate trust services, including custody, mutual fund supervisor, registrar, escrow agent, security agent, and debenture holder's representative services; international trade remittance, fund transfer, and foreign exchange services; business solutions; and digital banking services. It provides its products and services through its head office and branch network in Thailand; and through its branches in Singapore, Hong Kong, Laos, Vietnam, China, and the Cayman Islands, as well as through its subsidiaries in Thailand, Singapore, Cambodia, and Myanmar. The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCC.BK.long_name: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited
SCC.BK.summary: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in cement, building materials, chemicals, packaging, and investment businesses in Thailand, Vietnam, Indonesia, China, and internationally. The company operates through Cement-Building Materials Business, Chemicals Business, Packaging Business, and Other segments. The Cement-Building Materials Business segment manufactures and sells grey cement, ready-mixed concrete, white cement, dry mortar, roof tiles, concrete paving blocks, ceramic tiles, and sanitary wares and fittings. It also distributes cement, building, and decorative products through distributors; and imports fuel products and waste paper. The Chemicals Business segment manufactures and sells olefins, polyolefins, and other chemical products. The Packaging Business segment manufactures and distributes paper and plastic packaging products, pulp, dissolving pulp, and printing and writing paper. The Other segment invests primarily in agricultural machines, automotive parts and components, and steel business, as well as other services. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCCC-R.BK.long_name: Siam City Cement Public Company Limited
SCCC-R.BK.summary: Siam City Cement Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, imports, exports, and sells cement and cement related products in Thailand. It operates through Cement, Concrete and Aggregate, Trading, and Light Building Material segments. The company offers portland, hydraulic, mixed, and masonry cement under the INSEE Cement brand name; conventional and pumping, waterproofing, small and big bored pile, topping, sulfate resistant, and non-shrink concrete under the INSEE Concrete brand name; plastering, brick laying, floor leveling, tile adhesive, dry concrete, non-shrink grout, flexible cementitious waterproof coating, tile grout, and other mortars under the INSEE Mortar brand name; and blocks, lintels, and panels under the INSEE SUPERBLOCK brand name. It also provides ready-mixed concrete and aggregates; construction materials and light-weight concrete products; and industrial waste disposal, alternative fuel, raw material trading, and industrial cleaning services. In addition, the company generates electricity from waste heat; and provides technical services, and information technology management and development services. Siam City Cement Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCCC.BK.long_name: Siam City Cement Public Company Limited
SCCC.BK.summary: Siam City Cement Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, imports, exports, and sells cement and cement related products in Thailand. It operates through Cement, Concrete and Aggregate, Trading, and Light Building Material segments. The company offers portland, hydraulic, mixed, and masonry cement under the INSEE Cement brand name; conventional and pumping, waterproofing, small and big bored pile, topping, sulfate resistant, and non-shrink concrete under the INSEE Concrete brand name; plastering, brick laying, floor leveling, tile adhesive, dry concrete, non-shrink grout, flexible cementitious waterproof coating, tile grout, and other mortars under the INSEE Mortar brand name; and blocks, lintels, and panels under the INSEE SUPERBLOCK brand name. It also provides ready-mixed concrete and aggregates; construction materials and light-weight concrete products; and industrial waste disposal, alternative fuel, raw material trading, and industrial cleaning services. In addition, the company generates electricity from waste heat; and provides technical services, and information technology management and development services. Siam City Cement Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCG-R.BK.summary: Sahacogen (Chonburi) Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity and steam in Thailand. It operates a cogeneration power plant with a capacity to produce 214 megawatts of electricity and 96 tons of steam per hour. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

SCG.BK.summary: Sahacogen (Chonburi) Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity and steam in Thailand. It operates a cogeneration power plant with a capacity to produce 214 megawatts of electricity and 96 tons of steam per hour. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

SCGP.BK.summary: SCG Packaging Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, produces and sells corrugated containers, retail display packaging, and flexible and rigid packaging for display and protection of products in Southeast Asia. It offers flexible and rigid primary packaging; secondary packaging, such as folding carton; and tertiary packaging, including corrugated containers, parcel box, and paper pallet. The company also offers food safety packaging, packaging papers, and eucalyptus wood. In addition, it offers services in the areas of designing and developing products with expertise in graphic design, product structure, and production using paper and other materials; and Paper X, a service to buy waste paper through an application. Further, the company offers design and manufacturing services for the small lot and on-demand packaging for SMEs; packaging design services; E-Commerce services; and an integration of services for marketing events. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. SCG Packaging Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Siam Cement Public Company Limited.

SCI.BK.summary: SCI Electric Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of electrical switch boards and galvanized steel structures to various public and private sector projects. It operates through three segments: Manufacture of Switch Board, Manufacture and Galvanized Service, and Services and Others. The Manufacturer of Switch Board segment manufactures and sells low and medium voltage electrical switch boards, cable trays, support systems, and related equipment. The Manufacture and Galvanized Service segment manufactures high voltage line tower and telecommunication towers, as well as galvanizing steel structures; sells wiring equipment; and offers hot dip galvanized services. The Services and Others segment offers project management services under the engineering, procurement, and construction contract; and sells electricity produced from the hydroelectric power plant. SCI Electric Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bang Bo, Thailand.

SCM-R.BK.summary: Successmore Being Public Company Limited operates as a network marketing company. It operates through Multi-Level Marketing, Distributor Sales, and Rendering Services segments. The company is involved in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of dietary supplements, cosmetics, skin care products, lifestyle products, home products, and plant supplement products. It also arranges seminars; and provides render services for staff training. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCM.BK.summary: Successmore Being Public Company Limited operates as a network marketing company. It operates through Multi-Level Marketing, Distributor Sales, and Rendering Services segments. The company is involved in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of dietary supplements, cosmetics, skin care products, lifestyle products, home products, and plant supplement products; and sale of agricultural chemical products and pesticide products. It also arranges seminars; and provides render services for staff training. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCN.BK.summary: Scan Inter Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in trading natural gas through vehicle service stations in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Gas Related Business, Car Dealer and Spare Parts, Renewable Energy, and Others. The Gas Related Business segment engages in trading gas through natural gas for vehicle (NGV) service stations; filling gas of industrial compressed natural gas for industrial applications; providing service for quality improvement of natural gas; and transporting natural gas. This segment is also involved in the design, installation, repair, and maintenance of natural gas dispenser equipment; and design and installation of gas system in vehicles, as well as the testing of vehicle cylinders. It owns 13 NGV service stations. The Car Dealer and Spare Parts segment trades in cars and related spare parts. The Renewable Energy segment operates a solar power plant. The Others segment trades in liquid carbon dioxide, engine oil, and lubricants; and operates convenient stores, as well as provides transportation, warehousing, and distribution services.it also exports battery and glass. Scan Inter Public Company Limited is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

SCP-R.BK.long_name: Southern Concrete Pile Public Company Limited
SCP-R.BK.summary: Southern Concrete Pile Public Company Limited manufactures, sells, installs, and services prestressed concrete products primarily in Thailand. Its prestressed concrete products include prestressed concrete piles, prestressed concrete spun piles, prestressed concrete slabs, prestressed plank girders, and retaining prestressed concrete piles. The company also offers electricity concrete products comprising prestressed concrete poles, concrete cross-arms, and concrete stabs, as well as prestressed anchors and pole foundations; and precasted concrete product, such as concrete flooring tiles, concrete mortar flooring tiles, concrete paving blocks, round big curbs, precast reinforced concrete, and main-holds. It sells its products to the public sector and state enterprises, provincial electricity authority, key accounts, retail customers, contractors, and project owners. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCP.BK.long_name: Southern Concrete Pile Public Company Limited
SCP.BK.summary: Southern Concrete Pile Public Company Limited manufactures, sells, installs, and services prestressed concrete products primarily in Thailand. Its prestressed concrete products include prestressed concrete piles, prestressed concrete spun piles, prestressed concrete slabs, prestressed plank girders, and retaining prestressed concrete piles. The company also offers electricity concrete products comprising prestressed concrete poles, concrete cross-arms, and concrete stabs, as well as prestressed anchors and pole foundations; and precasted concrete product, such as concrete flooring tiles, concrete mortar flooring tiles, concrete paving blocks, round big curbs, precast reinforced concrete, and main-holds. It sells its products to the public sector and state enterprises, provincial electricity authority, key accounts, retail customers, contractors, and project owners. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCVPY.long_name: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited
SCVPY.summary: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in cement, building materials, chemicals, packaging, and investment businesses in Thailand, Vietnam, Indonesia, China, and internationally. The company operates through Cement-Building Materials Business, Chemicals Business, Packaging Business, and Other segments. The Cement-Building Materials Business segment manufactures and sells grey cement, ready-mixed concrete, white cement, dry mortar, roof tiles, concrete paving blocks, ceramic tiles, and sanitary wares and fittings. It also distributes cement, building, and decorative products through distributors; and imports fuel products and waste paper. The Chemicals Business segment manufactures and sells olefins, polyolefins, and other chemical products. The Packaging Business segment manufactures and distributes paper and plastic packaging products, pulp, dissolving pulp, and printing and writing paper. The Other segment invests primarily in agricultural machines, automotive parts and components, and steel business, as well as other services. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SDC-R.BK.summary: Samart Digital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes communications and electronics equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Digital Network and Digital Content. The Digital Network segment provides digital trunked radio systems and distribution equipment, audio-visual equipment network and software systems, and mobile antenna services. The Digital Content segment offers voice, audiovisual or multimedia, and infotainment services through mobile phones; content services through multimedia channels; multimedia and interactive media services; website services; and entertainment services, as well as produces television and radio programs, printed media, and billboards. It also engages in the production of outsource, live broadcast, and taped sporting events. The company was formerly known as Samart I-Mobile Public Company Limited and changed its name to Samart Digital Public Company Limited in October 2017. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand. Samart Digital Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Samart Corporation Public Company Limited.

SDC.BK.summary: Samart Digital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes communications and electronics equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Digital Network and Digital Content. The Digital Network segment provides digital trunked radio systems and distribution equipment, audio-visual equipment network and software systems, and mobile antenna services. The Digital Content segment offers voice, audiovisual or multimedia, and infotainment services through mobile phones; content services through multimedia channels; multimedia and interactive media services; website services; and entertainment services, as well as produces television and radio programs, printed media, and billboards. It also engages in the production of outsource, live broadcast, and taped sporting events. The company was formerly known as Samart I-Mobile Public Company Limited and changed its name to Samart Digital Public Company Limited in October 2017. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand. Samart Digital Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Samart Corporation Public Company Limited.

SE-R.BK.summary: SiamEast Solutions Public Company Limited distributes industrial equipment in Thailand. The company offers centrifugal pumps for utility systems and industrial production processes; positive displacement pumps for high viscosity fluids; liquid ring gas and centrifugal gas compressors; and energy efficiency measurement of pump systems, as well as engineering services for pumps. It also provides production process equipment, including strainers, filters, decanter centrifuges, mist eliminators, desiccants, ceramic catalyst bed support products, equipment to exchange materials, thermal and combustion units, air pollution treatment units, plastic pipes, plastic lined galvanized steel pipes, fire hoses, plastic tanks, breather valves, pressure relief valves, pressure relief plates, flameless explosion venting devices, isolation valves, and explosion suppression. In addition, the company offers adhesive products comprising cyanoacrylate glues, anaerobic adhesives, thread sealings, retainings, liquid gaskets, gasket sheet and spiral wound gaskets, and epoxy glues; sealant materials consisting of silicone and acrylic sealants, and polyurethane grouts; coating materials, such as coating and rust treatment products; and occupational health and safety products, including industrial cleaning paper products, machine tool removers, hand cleansers, gasket removers, safety glasses, safety gloves, body protection suits, fire blankets, chemical protection guards, heat resistant glass products, insulation products, pipe repairing kits, and cutting and grinding discs. Further, it provides surface coating services for machinery and equipment; design and sewing services for insulating covering machinery and equipment; demolition, assembly, installation, and testing services; and other services for the installation of a new pump. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

SE.BK.summary: SiamEast Solutions Public Company Limited distributes industrial equipment in Thailand. The company offers centrifugal pumps for utility systems and industrial production processes; positive displacement pumps for high viscosity fluids; liquid ring gas and centrifugal gas compressors; and energy efficiency measurement of pump systems, as well as engineering services for pumps. It also provides production process equipment, including strainers, filters, decanter centrifuges, mist eliminators, desiccants, ceramic catalyst bed support products, equipment to exchange materials, thermal and combustion units, air pollution treatment units, plastic pipes, plastic lined galvanized steel pipes, fire hoses, plastic tanks, breather valves, pressure relief valves, pressure relief plates, flameless explosion venting devices, isolation valves, and explosion suppression. Further, it provides surface coating services for machinery and equipment; design and sewing services for insulating covering machinery and equipment; demolition, assembly, installation, and testing services; and other services for the installation of a new pump. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

SEAFCO-R.BK.summary: Seafco Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the contractual construction of foundation and general public works in Thailand and internationally. It offers bored piling services, such as small and large diameter bored piling, auger drilling for bored piles, and drilling with bucket under slurries; rectangular, L shape, and T shape barrette piling services; and diaphragm walling services for deep basements, underpass tunnels, MRTA subway stations, and cut and cover tunnels. The company also undertakes substructure works, including foundation pile and diaphragm wall construction, temporary bracing installation, excavation, and construction of foundation mat and basement slabs. In addition, it engages in the civil construction of turnkey projects comprising underpass tunnels, fish marketplaces, and sports stadiums; and ground improvement works, such as soil improvement, deep mixing, and jet grouting for embankment foundations of highways, canals, river banks, tunnel openings, etc., as well as provision of vertical drain installation services. Further, the company offers ancillary services, including as sonic integrity test, drilling monitoring, pile load testing, and inclinometer monitoring, as well as rental services for movable and immovable assets. Seafco Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SEAFCO.BK.summary: Seafco Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the contractual construction of foundation and general public works in Thailand and internationally. It offers bored piling services, such as small and large diameter bored piling, auger drilling for bored piles, and drilling with bucket under slurries; rectangular, L shape, and T shape barrette piling services; and diaphragm walling services for deep basements, underpass tunnels, MRTA subway stations, and cut and cover tunnels. The company also undertakes substructure works, including foundation pile and diaphragm wall construction, temporary bracing installation, excavation, and construction of foundation mat and basement slabs. In addition, it engages in the civil construction of turnkey projects comprising underpass tunnels, fish marketplaces, and sports stadiums; and ground improvement works, such as soil improvement, deep mixing, and jet grouting for embankment foundations of highways, canals, river banks, tunnel openings, etc., as well as provision of vertical drain installation services. Further, the company offers ancillary services, including as sonic integrity test, drilling monitoring, pile load testing, and inclinometer monitoring, as well as rental services for movable and immovable assets. Seafco Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SEAOIL-R.BK.summary: Sea Oil Public Company Limited engages in the retail sale of fuel and lubricant oils, and related products primarily for tankers, fishery boats, and reefer vessels in Thailand, Singapore, Laos, Cambodia, Myanmar, and internationally. It offers marine fuel oil, high speed diesel oil, lubricants, and benzene. The company also provides catering and housekeeping services for oil and gas drilling crew; management services for solar power plant; generates electricity from solar power plant, and sells solar roof tops; and produces and distributes solvents and liquefied petroleum products, including white spirit, rubber solvent, diesel, and fuel oil. It serves land customers, factories, and transportation industries. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SEAOIL.BK.summary: Sea Oil Public Company Limited engages in the retail sale of fuel and lubricant oils, and related products primarily for tankers, fishery boats, and reefer vessels in Thailand, Singapore, Laos, Cambodia, Myanmar, and internationally. It offers marine fuel oil, high speed diesel oil, lubricants, and benzene. The company also provides catering and housekeeping services for oil and gas drilling crew; management services for solar power plant; generates electricity from solar power plant, and sells solar roof tops; and produces and distributes solvents and liquefied petroleum products, including white spirit, rubber solvent, diesel, and fuel oil. It serves land customers, factories, and transportation industries. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SELIC-R.BK.summary: Selic Corp Public Company Limited produces and distributes industrial adhesives in Thailand. The company offers hot melt, water based, and solvent based adhesives; and services, such as sample testing, consultation, recommendation, production line audit, foundation training, and other services. It also produces and distributes self-adhesive labels; and wholesales industrial chemicals. The company serves various industries, such as leather and shoes, furniture, packaging and labelling, food and beverage, printing, woodworking, automotive parts, etc. It also exports its products to Asia, Africa, Australia, the Middle East, South America, and New Zealand. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SELIC.BK.summary: Selic Corp Public Company Limited produces and distributes industrial adhesives in Thailand. The company offers hot melt, water based, and solvent based adhesives; and services, such as sample testing, consultation, recommendation, production line audit, foundation training, and other services. It also produces and distributes self-adhesive labels; and wholesales industrial chemicals. The company serves various industries, such as leather and shoes, furniture, packaging and labelling, food and beverage, printing, woodworking, automotive parts, etc. It also exports its products to Asia, Africa, Australia, the Middle East, South America, and New Zealand. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SENA-R.BK.summary: Sena Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of properties in Thailand. It primarily develops single-detached houses, townhouses, commercial buildings, and condominiums; and rents apartments, small shopping centers, and office buildings. The company is also involved in the golf course and juristic person management businesses. In addition, it manufactures and distributes electricity from solar energy; and acts as a real estate agent and broker. The company was formerly known as Krungthep Keha Group Co., Ltd. Sena Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SENA.BK.summary: Sena Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of properties in Thailand. It primarily develops single-detached houses, townhouses, commercial buildings, and condominiums; and rents apartments, small shopping centers, and office buildings. The company is also involved in the golf course and juristic person management businesses. In addition, it manufactures and distributes electricity from solar energy; and acts as a real estate agent and broker. The company was formerly known as Krungthep Keha Group Co., Ltd. Sena Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SF.BK.long_name: Siam Future Development Public Company Limited
SF.BK.summary: Siam Future Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the rental of building space and provision of utility services in Thailand. It is involved in the development and management of shopping centers; and installation of electricity and water meters. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 18 centers with gross leasable area of approximately 430,628 square meters. It also provides utility services that comprise electricity, gas, water supply, and telephone services; and location procurement services. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SFLEX-R.BK.summary: Starflex Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes flexible packaging in Thailand. It offers packaging products for food and non-food. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bang Bo, Thailand.

SFLEX.BK.summary: Starflex Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes flexible packaging in Thailand. It offers packaging products for food and non-food. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bang Bo, Thailand.

SFP.BK.long_name: Siam Food Products Public Company Limited
SFP.BK.summary: Siam Food Products Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, grows, manufactures, and distributes processed food from agricultural products. Its products include pineapples in cans; aseptic and plastic bags; pineapple juice concentrates; other fruits in can and plastic cups; and canned pineapple juices, as well as animal feeds. The company is also involved in the commercial and investment activities. It also exports its products to the United States, the United Kingdom, Japan, Scandinavia, Germany, the Netherlands, France, Italy, and Spain. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Siam Food Products Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Plantheon Company Limited.

SFT-R.BK.summary: Shrinkflex (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes PVC and PET shrink sleeve labels in Thailand. It offers shrinkable packaging by gravure and digital process. The company also offers stretch film products; and provides consulting services. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Chachoengsao, Thailand.

SFT.BK.summary: Shrinkflex (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes PVC and PET shrink sleeve labels in Thailand. It offers shrinkable packaging by gravure and digital process. The company also offers stretch film products; and provides consulting services. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Chachoengsao, Thailand.

SGF-R.BK.summary: SGF Capital Public Company Limited provides factoring, loans, personal loans, and leasing services in Thailand. The company operates through Purchase of Account Receivable, Leasing and Hire Purchase, and Loan segments. It provides automobile and motorcycle hire purchase loans; personal loan against vehicle registration as collateral; long and short term loan; and nano finance. The company also offers financial advice and legal counsel services, as well as purchase or transfer of loan receivables. In addition, it provides services related to building and place. The company was formerly known as Siam General Factoring Public Company Limited and changed its name to SGF Capital Public Company Limited in May 2017. SGF Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SGF.BK.summary: SGF Capital Public Company Limited provides factoring, loans, personal loans, and leasing services in Thailand. The company operates through Purchase of Account Receivable, Leasing and Hire Purchase, and Loan segments. It provides automobile and motorcycle hire purchase loans; personal loan against vehicle registration as collateral; long and short term loan; personal loan; and Nano finance. The company also offers financial advice and legal counsel services, as well as purchase or transfer of loan receivables. In addition, it provides services related to building and place. The company was formerly known as Siam General Factoring Public Company Limited and changed its name to SGF Capital Public Company Limited in May 2017. SGF Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SGP-R.BK.long_name: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited
SGP-R.BK.summary: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and petrochemical products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum and Petrochemical Products, Transportation Services, and Other segments. It is also involved in the trading of petroleum for household cooking, industry, and transportation sectors. In addition, the company provides transportation services by land and ship; manufactures and distributes LPG cylinders; and offers warehousing and storage, and oil depots and port services. The company was formerly known as VSPP Development Company Limited. Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SGP.BK.long_name: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited
SGP.BK.summary: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and petrochemical products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum and Petrochemical Products, Transportation Services, and Other segments. It is also involved in the trading of petroleum for household cooking, industry, and transportation sectors. In addition, the company provides transportation services by land and ship; manufactures and distributes LPG cylinders; and offers warehousing and storage, and oil depots and port services. The company was formerly known as VSPP Development Company Limited. Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SHANG-R.BK.summary: Shangri-La Hotel Public Company Limited operates hotels in Bangkok and Chiang Mai. It provides lodging, and food and beverage services, as well as facilities for conferences and functions. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Shangri-La Hotel Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Shangri-La Asia Limited.

SHANG.BK.summary: Shangri-La Hotel Public Company Limited operates hotels in Bangkok and Chiang Mai. It provides lodging, and food and beverage services, as well as facilities for conferences and functions. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Shangri-La Hotel Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Shangri-La Asia Limited.

SHR.BK.short_name: S HOTELS AND RESORTS PUBLIC COM
SHR.BK.long_name: S Hotels and Resorts Public Company Limited
SHR.BK.summary: S Hotels and Resorts Public Company Limited engages in the investment, hospitality, and related businesses in Thailand and internationally. It offers a portfolio of 39 properties to guests in the Republic of Maldives, the Republic of Fiji, the Republic of Mauritius, the United Kingdom, and Thailand. The company is based in Bangkok, Thailand. S Hotels and Resorts Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Singha Estate Public Company Limited.

SHREIT.BK.long_name: Strategic Hospitality Extendable Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
SHREIT.BK.summary: Strategic Hospitality Extendable Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust ("SHREIT") is a pioneering international REIT managed by Strategic Property Investors Company Limited. We provide investors with well-diversified portfolio of hospitality assets, access to younger and faster growing Mekong region countries through a regulated vehicle. SHREIT's initial portfolio is spread across key cities in Mekong region Â Ho Chi Minh City and Jakarta. Each of the asset in the initial portfolio is strategically located, urban focused, and fully differentiates itself from it competitors. The REIT's hotels are catered for different customer segments, ranging from economy to luxury, with a total of 632 rooms under management. The hotels are operated by top international hotel operators such as Accor and Frasers.

SIAM.BK.long_name: Siam Steel International Public Company Limited
SIAM.BK.summary: Siam Steel International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells steel office equipment and furniture, and furniture parts in Thailand. The company is also involved in construction business. Its steel and wooden furniture products include cabinets, lockers, and combine furniture systems; desks and tables; chairs; partitions; safes; shelving systems; and furniture for stadiums comprising bleachers and folding stages. In addition, the company provides prefabricated building systems that consist of permanent buildings, which includes business hotels, convenience stores, showrooms, etc.; temporary buildings, such as mobile offices, mobile clinics, kiosks, mobile toilets, etc.; and storage buildings, which consists telecom shelters, warehouse units, soundproof rooms, etc. Further, it offers special products, such as flood protection panel and related products, bathroom pods, smart wall systems, earthquake and seismic retrofits, bulletproof security products, and steel structure solutions, as well as building materials, including doors, staircases, etc. It also invests in solar energy plants and alternative energy; and manufactures and distributes solar equipment. The company offers its products under the Lucky, Kingdom, Flowork, Okamura, Chitose, Poilet, ITO, and Pilot brand names. Siam Steel International Public Company Limited was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand.

SICT-R.BK.long_name: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited
SICT-R.BK.summary: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited, an integrated circuit (IC) design company, designs, markets, and sells microchips for RFID applications. It offers linear and mixed-signal ICs; microchips for access and immobilizer systems, livestock identification tags, near field communications, and access control and interrogator or reader systems; and high and low frequency transponder ICs. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SICT.BK.long_name: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited
SICT.BK.summary: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited, an integrated circuit (IC) design company, designs, markets, and sells microchips for RFID applications. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SIMAT-R.BK.summary: Simat Technologies Public Company Limited distributes computer hardware, software, and network accessories in Thailand and Malaysia. The company also offers computer information technology system development services. It sells various hardware products, such as corded and cordless barcode scanners, micro kiosks, mobile printers, barcode and label printers, card printers, face recognition products, mobile computers, wireless and networking products, RFID barcode readers and printers, and RFID antennas. The company also provides various software products comprising ManageSales, a sales force automation system; ManageWare, a warehouse management system solution; MobileNET; and Sky Frog. In addition, it manufactures self-adhesive label stickers, such as ribbonless, ESD, high temperature, healthcare, and barcode and serialize labels. Further, the company offers project management, implementation and training, helpdesk support, software customization and maintenance, custom software development, and technical services. Simat Technologies Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SIMAT.BK.summary: Simat Technologies Public Company Limited distributes computer hardware, software, and network accessories in Thailand and Malaysia. The company also offers computer information technology system development services. It sells various hardware products, such as corded and cordless barcode scanners, micro kiosks, mobile printers, barcode and label printers, card printers, face recognition products, mobile computers, wireless and networking products, RFID barcode readers and printers, and RFID antennas. The company also provides various software products comprising ManageSales, a sales force automation system; ManageWare, a warehouse management system solution; MobileNET; and Sky Frog. In addition, it manufactures self-adhesive label stickers, such as ribbonless, ESD, high temperature, healthcare, and barcode and serialize labels. Further, the company offers project management, implementation and training, helpdesk support, software customization and maintenance, custom software development, and technical services. Simat Technologies Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SINGER-R.BK.summary: Singer Thailand Public Company Limited distributes household electrical and commercial appliances in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Trade sales, Hire purchase and loans, and Service and Others. It offers household electrical appliances, such as sewing machines, sewing needles, general lubricating oils in drip bottles, and scissors; refrigerators, washing machines, gas stoves, and air conditioners; and audio and video products, including flat screen LED TVs, smart TVs, and home theatre systems. The company also provides commercial appliances comprising freezers, beverage coolers, wine cooler cabinets, bakery freezers, and slush ice machines; mobile phone airtime, petrol, and drinking water vending machines; and agricultural equipment and tools, such as water pumps and other products. In addition, the company engages in the life and non-life insurance brokerage business; hire purchase of home appliances, commercial products, mobile phones, and vehicles, as well as loan receivables with vehicle collateral and others; and repair and maintenance service of electrical appliances. Further, it provides debt collection services to a related company. The company sells its products under the Singer brand name through a network of branch outlets and sales representatives, as well as through debt collectors in Thailand. Singer Thailand Public Company Limited was founded in 1889 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SIPF.F.summary: The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited provides various financial products and services. It operates in four segments: Corporate, SME, Retail, and Insurance. The company offers deposit products, such as savings, current, fixed deposit, long term deposit, foreign currency, and E passbook deposit accounts; home, car, personal, and mortgage loans; debit, prepaid, and credit cards; investment products comprising mutual funds, debentures, bonds, and other investments; accident, savings, health expense, income protection, heritage and life protection, travel, motor, property, unit linked, and other insurance products; and various payment services. It also provides credit facilities, such as overdrafts, promissory notes, clean bill discounts, long term loans, letter of guarantee, standby letter of credit, and acceptance/Aval; financial advisory and merger acquisition services; fixed income instrument and underwriting services; structured and project finance services; and foreign exchange and interest rate risk management services. In addition, the company offers business collection, business payments, and bank accounts and liquidity management solutions; corporate trust services, including custody, mutual fund supervisor, registrar, escrow agent, security agent, and debenture holder's representative services; international trade remittance, fund transfer, and foreign exchange services; business solutions; and digital banking services. It provides its products and services through its head office and branch network in Thailand; and through its branches in Singapore, Hong Kong, Laos, Vietnam, China, and the Cayman Islands, as well as through its subsidiaries in Thailand, Singapore, Cambodia, and Myanmar. The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SIRI-R.BK.summary: Sansiri Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates through Property Development; Building Management, Project Management and Real Estate Brokerage; Hotel Management; and Other segments. The Property Development segment develops land and housing projects, as well as residential condominium projects; and rents serviced apartments and office buildings. The Building Management, Project Management and Real Estate Brokerage segment provides building management, property project management, and real estate brokerage services. The Hotel Management segment manages hotels. The Other segment is involved in the hotel and education businesses. The company also offers events management, restaurant club management, and administrative services; and engages in E-commerce and retail businesses, as well as distributes standard branded products. Sansiri Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SIS.BK.summary: SiS Distribution (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes computer components, smartphones, and office automation equipment in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Commercial Products, Consumer Products, Value Added Products, and Phones. It offers servers, home and business PCs, storage and networking devices, printers/scanners, and monitors; and private cloud, enterprise storage and backup, and security services. The company is also involved in the service and rental of computers and accessories. SiS Distribution (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SISB-R.BK.summary: SISB Public Company Limited provides educational services. The company owns and manages Singapore international schools in Thailand, including four campuses that adopt Singapore and the United Kingdom curricula as the foundation for teaching and learning. Its campuses teach English, Thai, and Chinese to students. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SITHAI-R.BK.summary: Srithai Superware Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes household plasticware and industrial products in Vietnam and internationally. It provides various food packaging products, including in mould labeling and food container products; beverage packaging products comprising PET bottles, closures, and preforms; rigid packaging products; automotive and motorcycle battery cases; material handling products, such as pallets, containers, and crates; garbage bins; plastic furniture products; and stadium, outdoor, auditorium, and unicorn seats, as well as lobby waiting chairs. The company also offers melamine tableware products; and mould for plastic injection. In addition, it operates a super outlet store. Srithai Superware Public Company Limited was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SK-R.BK.summary: Sirakorn Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes concrete products. The company offers pre-stressed concrete poles, cross-arms, beams, stubs, piles, and bridge girders. It also undertakes civil construction works, including building, dam, concrete bridge, and retaining wall works, as well as electrical substations; and the construction of high voltage transmission and distribution lines. The company offers its services to the public and private sector. Sirakorn Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

SKE-R.BK.summary: Sakol Energy Public Company Limited operates in the energy industry in Thailand. The company provides natural gas compression services to the natural gas transportation vehicles of PTT Public Company Limited. It also produces and sells compressed bio-methane gas; operates biomass power plant with the installed capacity of 9.9 MW; and rents real estate property. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

SKN-R.BK.summary: S.Kijchai Enterprise Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes wood substitute products with medium density fiber boards in Thailand. The company's products include furniture, flooring, and interior products, as well as doors. It also offers glue, chemical, rubber, sawmill, and plywood products, as well as fuel briquettes. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand. S.Kijchai Enterprise Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of S.Kijchai Capital Co.,Ltd.

SKR-R.BK.summary: Sikarin Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates hospitals in Thailand. It operates diabetes and endocrine center, general medicine clinic, orthopedic center, emergency and trauma center, surgery clinic, children center, dental center, aesthetic center, laboratory department, diagnostic radiology center, CT scan unit, operating rooms, hemodialysis unit, physical therapy department with physical medicine and rehabilitation specialist, catheter laboratory, intensive care units, coronary care unit, inpatient wards and international wards, after heart and thoracic surgery ward, medical ward, and pediatric ward. The company also operates woman's health center, health center, fertility center, delivery room, nursery department and the inpatient wards, obstetrics and gynecology ward, gastroenterology and scope center, neurology center, stroke center, EENT center, international medical center, and MRI center. It is also involved in the management of rental spaces; and sale of food and beverages. The company's hospitals comprise Sikarin Hospital with 355 beds in Bangkok; Rattarin Hospital with 100 beds in Muang; and Sikarin Hat-Yai Hospital with 350 beds in Hat Yai. Sikarin Public Company Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SKY.BK.summary: Sky ICT Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, engages in information and communication technology (ICT), and system integration businesses in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: System Integration, Sales and Service, and Finance Lease segments. It offers consultation, design, installation, maintenance, procurement, and distribution of products and equipment related to the ICT and system integration. The company also provides CCTV, smart office, smart home, smart city, networks infrastructure, cyber security, and unified communication solutions; and network cabling services, including network cable management, single and multi-mode fiber optic cabling, LAN installation and cable management, and rack cabinet installation for network and server/CCTV security installation. In addition, it distributes IT products, such as computer, notebook, scanner, printer, toner, server, storage, switch, and software products; and non-IT solutions. Further, the company is involved in the finance lease business. Sky ICT Public Company Limited serves clients in the education, banking, security, government, and other sectors. The company was formerly known as CCN-TECH Public Company Limited and changed its name to Sky ICT Public Company Limited July 2017. Sky ICT Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SMIT-R.BK.summary: Sahamit Machinery Public Company Limited imports and distributes materials, machinery, and appliances for industries in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Steel & Heat Treatment, Machine Tools & Tooling, and Others. It provides special steels for making molds, including hot work tool steel for aluminum extrusion and die-casting; cold work tool steel for blanking and punching tools, shear blades, automobiles, and electronic appliances; high speed steel for end mill cutters, twist drills, and wood-working tools; and plastic mold steel for PVC pipes, melamine kitchenware, and screw parts in the plastic injection machines. The company also offers CNC EDM, wire cutting, high speed machining center, and measuring machines; and machinery, including carbide cutting tools, digital readouts, measuring equipment, milling machines, surface grinding machines, and automatic band sawing machines, as well as spare parts. In addition, it provides pulp and paper products, machinery, accessories, forming fabric felts, canvass, refiner plates, chemicals, etc. for pulp and paper industry; and offers paper converting services. Further, the company distributes a range of electrotechnical products and services, including electrical measuring instruments, batteries, antennas, cores, potentiometers, power capacitors, radio interference suppression components, and switchgears, as well as offers electrical engineering services; and aluminum alloys. Additionally, it provides wood processing machinery and equipment, as well as heat treatment services; and chipper, flaker, circular, and straight knives. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SMPC-R.BK.long_name: Sahamitr Pressure Container Public Company Limited
SMPC-R.BK.summary: Sahamitr Pressure Container Public Company Limited manufactures and sells LPG and other pressure cylinders in Thailand and internationally. It offers LPG cylinders; automotive LPG cylinders; methyl bromide cylinders, refrigerant cylinders, chlorine cylinders, ammonia cylinders, lubricant cylinders, and propane cylinders for forklifts; and parts and components, such as collars, footrings, spuds/bungs, and cylinder caps. The company also provides container repairs and quality testing services; and reconditioning services for damaged cylinders, paint coatings, and valve replacements. It sells its products under SMPC name. The company also exports its products. Sahamitr Pressure Container Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SMT-R.BK.summary: Stars Microelectronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides electronics manufacturing services in Thailand and the United States. It operates through two segments, Microelectronics Module Assembly and Integrated Circuit (IC) Packaging. The company is involved in the manufacture and distribution of integrated circuit boards and radio frequency identification tags; and equipment used to generate electricity from solar energy or alternative energy. It also engages in the generation and distribution of electricity from solar energy or alternative energy; and trading business. The company provides services to original equipment manufacturers, original design manufacturer, and outsourced assembly and test that offers IC packaging services. Its services cover IC packaging and testing; print circuit board assembly (PCBA) and box build, which cover Internet of Things, medical, energy management, and automotive devices, as well as industrial control modules; and fiber optics devices comprising data center, broadcasting, and LiDAR applications. The company serves electronic equipment, automobiles, medical equipment, communications, and entertainment industries. Stars Microelectronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.

SNC-R.BK.summary: SNC Former Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells component parts for automobile air conditioners and cooling machines in Thailand and internationally. It is also involved in the contract manufacturing and assembly of air conditioners for household use. In addition, the company manufactures plastic parts for electric appliance and automobiles; household and automotive air conditioner parts; heat pumps for water heat pumps; insulation copper price kits used for the installation of cooling machines and foam pipe insulation; and tools for equipment. Further, it engages in the generation of biomass electric plant garbage; and invests in alternative power plant. SNC Former Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

SNP-R.BK.summary: S&P Syndicate Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates a chain of restaurants and bakery shops. The company operates through Domestic Restaurants and Bakery Shops, Packaged Food and Bakery Trading Business, Overseas Restaurants, and Others segments. It also produces cakes, bread, baked goods, Thai desserts, prepared frozen foods, and other bakery products; and provides home delivery, outside catering, and manufacturing service to restaurants and companies. The company sells sausage under the S&P Premo; cookies and snacks under the S&P Delio; frozen food under the S&P Quick Meal; carrageenan jelly under the S&P Jelio; and moon cake under the Golden Dragon brand names. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 502 branches in Thailand, as well as 3 franchise under the Maisen and Umenohana brands; and 15 restaurants internationally. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SO-R.BK.summary: Siamrajathanee Public Company Limited provides various outsourcing services to public and private sectors in Thailand. It also offers car rental services; Mr.Journey, a shuttle van for wheelchair users; online document management systems; data recording, invoice registration, and scanning services; landscape management; and tree trimming services. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand.

SORKON-R.BK.long_name: S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited
SORKON-R.BK.summary: S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes processed food products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Production Food from Pork, Processed Seafood, Restaurants, and Swine Farm. It offers processed seafood, such as fish balls and rolls, shrimp and squid balls, etc.; fried fish and shrimp balls, deep fried fish paste, fish tofu, fried fish rolls, etc.; spicy sauces, chilli paste, etc.; ready-to-eat products; and frozen seafoods, including squid, hard clams, shrimps, fishes, etc. under the Taechiew, Kwangchow, Kaoloon, Shanghai, Hong Kong, Taipei, Mahachai, Kaizen, and Odeng brands. The company also provides Thai native foods under the S. Khonkaen, Moo Dee, Huay Kaew, Ban Phai, Moo Champ, and sethi brands; pork and chicken snack products, which include pork crispy and caps under the EntreÃ©; frozen foods under the Yunnan brand; and papaya salad and roasted chicken under the Zaap Classic brand. In addition, it is involved in breeding and selling of finishing swine; food and beverage distribution; and restaurant and franchise businesses, as well as offers training and seminar services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 13 quick service restaurants. S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SORKON.BK.long_name: S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited
SORKON.BK.summary: S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes processed food products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Production Food from Pork, Processed Seafood, Restaurants, and Swine Farm. It offers processed seafood, such as fish balls and rolls, shrimp and squid balls, etc.; fried fish and shrimp balls, deep fried fish paste, fish tofu, fried fish rolls, etc.; spicy sauces, chilli paste, etc.; ready-to-eat products; and frozen seafoods, including squid, hard clams, shrimps, fishes, etc. under the Taechiew, Kwangchow, Kaoloon, Shanghai, Hong Kong, Taipei, Mahachai, Kaizen, and Odeng brands. The company also provides Thai native foods under the S. Khonkaen, Moo Dee, Huay Kaew, Ban Phai, Moo Champ, and sethi brands; pork and chicken snack products, which include pork crispy and caps under the EntreÃ©; frozen foods under the Yunnan brand; and papaya salad and roasted chicken under the Zaap Classic brand. In addition, it is involved in breeding and selling of finishing swine; food and beverage distribution; and restaurant and franchise businesses, as well as offers training and seminar services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 13 quick service restaurants. S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPA.BK.long_name: Siam Wellness Group Public Company Limited
SPA.BK.summary: Siam Wellness Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the health spa and spa-related businesses. The company operates RarinJinda Wellness Spa, a wellness spa; Let's Relax, a day spa service; Baan Suan Massage center; Stretch me by Let's Relax, a stretching studio; Stretch me Clinic; RarinJinda Wellness Spa Resort, a boutique hotel resort; and a restaurant under the Deck One name in Chiang Mai city, as well as offers Dr. Spiller Pure Skin Care Solutions for facial indulgence. It also distributes spa and therapeutic personal care products, such as massage and essential oils, body lotions and scrubs, liquid and bar soaps, shower gels, herbal tea, and other products under the Blooming, Let's Relax, and Let's Relax Lifestyle brands; and spa equipment, such as electric blankets, massage bed sheets, and facial and slimming devices, as well as provides management and consultancy services. The company operates a Thai massage school under the Siam Wellness Thai Massage and Spa School name. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 70 branches in Thailand and internationally. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPACK-R.BK.long_name: S. Pack & Print Public Company Limited

It also engages in the offset printing business. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Songkhla, Thailand. S. Pack & Print Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Oji Holdings Corporation Company Limited.

SPALI-R.BK.summary: Supalai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development of real estate projects for living and commercial purposes in Thailand, the Philippines, and Australia. It operates through Real Estate Business; and Hotel Business and Management segments. The company owns and operates housing projects, including single detached houses, duplex houses, townhouses, and condominiums. It also develops and manages hotels and resorts; rents office buildings; and provides real estate project management. The company offers its services under the Supalai brand. Supalai Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPC-R.BK.summary: Saha Pathanapibul Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes consumer goods in Thailand and internationally. The company distributes food and beverage, household, personal care, and baby products. It also invests in real estate; rents office buildings; and provides instant noodles, mineral water, and dairy products, as well as plastic packaging products. The company offers its products through 90,000 distribution channels. Saha Pathanapibul Public Company Limited was founded in 1942 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPCG-R.BK.summary: SPCG Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity from solar energy in Thailand and internationally. The company has 36 solar farm projects with a total installed capacity of 260 megawatts. It is also involved in engineering, procurement, and construction, as well as operation, maintenance, and monitoring of solar farms. In addition, the company manufactures, trades in, and installs solar roof for residences, office buildings, government buildings, and industrial factories; and steel or metal roofing sheets. SPCG Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPG-R.BK.short_name: THE SIAM PAN GROUP PUBLIC COMPA
SPG-R.BK.long_name: Siam Pan Group Public Company Limited
SPG-R.BK.summary: Siam Pan Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes lubricating oils and greases, and automotive batteries in Thailand, Myanmar, and international. The company operates through three segments: Lubricating Oil, Grease, and Batteries. It offers lubricating oils for engines under the Trane, Deterla, and Super Star brands; lubricating greases for lubricating works under the Trane and Crocodile brands; and automotive batteries under the Boliden brand. The company is also involved in the manufacture and sale of plastic containers, caps, and lids. It also exports its products to Germany, Finland, Nigeria, Ghana, Gambia, Ethiopia, Lebanon, Dubai, Australia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, Singapore, Taiwan, Malaysia, Vietnam, Afghanistan, Sudan, Liberia, Angola, Myanmar, Indonesia, China, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Laos, Cambodia, and Burma. Siam Pan Group Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPI-R.BK.long_name: Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited
SPI-R.BK.summary: Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited engages in the investment and real estate businesses in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Investment in Consumer Products Business; Investment in Food and Beverage Business; and Industrial Park Development and Investment in Other Businesses. It invests in, develops, and rents a hotel and a golf course; and leases land and buildings. The company also invests in consumer products, such as textile and fashion, household, beauty and cosmetics, and other consumer products; and food and beverages, which include instant noodles and semi-finished foods, and bread and bakery products. In addition, it is involved in the development and operation of four industrial parks in Si Racha District, Chonburi Province; Kabinburi District, Prachinburi Province; Mueang Lamphun District, Lamphun Province; and Mae Sot District, Tak Province. Further, the company provides consultation on business planning and project execution, as well as trademark services. The company was formerly known as Saha Pathana Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited in 1984. Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPRC-R.BK.long_name: Star Petroleum Refining Public Company Limited
SPRC-R.BK.summary: Star Petroleum Refining Public Company Limited owns and operates a petroleum refinery in the Rayong Province of Thailand. It provides transportation fuels and petrochemical feedstock. The company also produces liquefied petroleum gas, polymer grade propylene, naphtha, gasoline, jet fuel, diesel, fuel oil, crude, reformate, sulfur, mixed C4, and asphalt. It exports its petroleum products to Laos, Cambodia, and Myanmar. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Mueang Rayong, Thailand. Star Petroleum Refining Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Chevron South Asia Holdings Pte. Ltd.

SPRIME.BK.short_name: S PRIME GROWTH LEASEHOLD REAL E
SPRIME.BK.long_name: S Prime Growth Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
SPRIME.BK.summary: S Prime Growth Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust operates as a real estate investment trust in Thailand. It invests in office buildings. The company qualifies as a real estate investment trust for federal income tax purposes. It generally would not be subject to federal corporate income taxes if it distributes at least 90% of its taxable income to its stockholders. S Prime Growth Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPVI.BK.short_name: S P V I PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITED
SPVI.BK.long_name: S P V I Public Company Limited
SPVI.BK.summary: S P V I Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of computers, mobile phones, and related accessories and services in Thailand. It also resells Apple products, including computers, iOS devices, and various other accessories. In addition, the company distributes products compatible with Apple, such as hard drives for video storage, portable hard drives, and printed and graphic products; and products associated with iOS devices comprising speakers, headphones, protective cases, and screen protectors. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 57 branches. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SQ-R.BK.summary: Sahakol Equipment Public Company Limited provides overburden and lignite removal services in Thailand and the Lao People's Democratic Republic. The company offers coal removal and extraction services, as well as operates power plants; and soil and coal extraction, and removal services for the Electricity Generating Authority of Thailand. It also rents machinery; and offers machinery maintenance, and mining panning and consulting services. In addition, the company engages in civil engineering construction works; and utility systems construction works, such as roads, residences, etc. Sahakol Equipment Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

It also rents machinery; and offers machinery maintenance, and mining panning and consulting services. In addition, the company engages in civil engineering construction works; and utility systems construction works, such as roads, residences, etc. Sahakol Equipment Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SR-R.BK.summary: Siamraj Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction of natural gas metering and pipeline transmission systems in Thailand. The company offers flow measuring systems and engineering services from branched natural gas pipeline to the power stations, process industrial plants, and natural gas service stations. It also engages in the design, construction, trading, installation, inspection, repairing, maintenance, and service of natural gas metering systems, such as gas chromatographs, flow metering elements, and flow computers and systems; and inspection, repair, and maintenance service of equipment in gas metering stations. In addition, the company owns, operates, and maintains NGV stations in Bangna; designs, supplies, and installs natural gas quality improvement systems; and develops solar energy and other alternative energy projects. Further, it provides manpower, accounting, financial, and maintenance services; and car park services comprising management of parking building and commercial property rental and related services. Additionally, the company provides industrial pump systems, such as gear pumps, sanitary pumps, screw pumps, vacuum systems, diaphragm pumps, process metering, and process centrifugal pumps; industrial and municipal waste treatment air compressors; and gas turbines and compressors for power plants. The company was formerly known as Siamrajathanee Corporation Company Limited and changed its name to Siamraj Public Company Limited in February 2015. Siamraj Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

SRICHA-R.BK.summary: Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited engages in construction and maintenance service businesses in Thailand and internationally. The company provides construction services in the areas of mechanical, welding, equipment and vessels, ducts, steel fabrication, shutdown, piping, turbine and generator, tanks, structural steel, pipe rack and buildings, piping work and installation, civil construction, permanent and temporary facilities, as well as sandblasting, grit blasting, and painting services. It also offers manpower supply agency services; and a range of maintenance services for power and petrochemical plants, oil refineries, industrial plants, etc., as well as rents construction equipment and tools. The company was formerly known as Sriracha Construction (1994) Co. Ltd and changed its name to Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited in December 2011. Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Si Racha, Thailand.

SSC-R.BK.summary: Sermsuk Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes soft drinks and beverages in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Carbonated Soft Drink and Non-Carbonated Soft Drink. The company provides drinking water, sport drinks, energy drinks, and other beverages, including tea and soda. It offers its products under the est, Crystal, Jubjai, 100 Plus, Wranger, Powerplus, v-boost, Oishi, and Rock Mountain brands. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Sermsuk Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of So Water Co., Ltd.

The company offers various food products, including boiled shrimp, sushi shrimp, fish, squid, etc.; ready to eat products, such as dim sum, deep-fried food, and processed chicken; and Halal products comprising dim sum and deep-fried food under the Farhana brand name. It also provides sales and marketing; and cold storage warehouse and logistic services. The company was formerly known as Surapon Seafoods Public Company Limited and changed its name to Surapon Foods Public Company Limited in 1996. Surapon Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

SSP-R.BK.summary: Sermsang Power Corporation Public Company Limited operates in the renewable energy business. The company produces electricity through solar farm and rooftop, and wind farm projects. It operates 7 solar farms and 7 solar rooftop projects of 194 MWp in Thailand, Japan, Vietnam, Mongolia, and Indonesia; and 1 wind farm in Vietnam. The company distributes its electricity to state and publicly traded utility corporations and industrial users. It also provides investment and consultancy services. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SSSC-R.BK.summary: Siam Steel Service Center Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells steel accessories in Thailand. The company offers cutting sheets and slitting coils for automotive, electrical appliances and electronics, furniture, and other related industries; and coated corrugated sheets for construction industries. It also provides metal roofing and wall panel installation, and steel cutting services; and special production and services. Siam Steel Service Center Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.
