THMUI-R.BK.long_name: Thai Mui Corporation Public Company Limited
THMUI-R.BK.summary: Thai Mui Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of wire rope products and lifting equipment in Thailand. It operates through Sales and Services; and Projects segments. The company offers single layer or single strand, and rotation resistant or multi strand wire ropes; flat and round webbing slings; steel chain slings; and lifting equipment, such as thimbles, wire rope clamps/clips, shackles, chain blocks, level blocks or level hoists, electric chain hoists, and masterlinks, as well as HDPE pipes, electric motors, hooks, and light bulbs. It also provides services that include inspection service on wire rope tensile strength and replacement services; visual inspection service of the crane and wire rope; non-destructive testing; and installation, repair, consultancy, and training services. The company was formerly known as Thai Mui Trading Corporation Co., Ltd. Thai Mui Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THMUI.BK.long_name: Thai Mui Corporation Public Company Limited

THNUY.summary: Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Thailand. It operates through six segments: Company, Securities Business, Life Insurance Business, Non-Life Insurance Business, Asset Management Business, and Hire Purchase and Leasing Business. The company offers commercial banking and asset management services; securities brokerage and analysis, proprietary trading, borrowing and lending, and investment and financial advisory services, as well as operates as an underwriter and securities registrar. It also provides non-life insurance products in the areas of fire, automobile, marine and transportation, and miscellaneous; life and health insurance products to individuals, institution clients, and general organizations; hire purchase services for trucks, pick-up cars, taxies, and big bikes; and lending services for cranes, fork lifts, motorcycles, excavators, etc. The company was formerly known as National Finance Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited in April 2006. Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1959 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

THRE.BK.summary: Thai Reinsurance Public Company Limited provides insurance and reinsurance products and services in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Conventional Products and Non-Conventional Products. The company offers reinsurance coverage for property, casualty, accident and health, engineering, and marine cargo. It also provides computer services in relation to motor insurance claim management; claim management and marketing services; and actuarial, training, and advisory services, as well as insurance outsourcing and consulting services. The company develops electronic commerce services. Thai Reinsurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

THREL-R.BK.long_name: Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited
THREL-R.BK.summary: Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited provides life reinsurance solutions to various life insurance companies in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Conventional Products and Non-Conventional Products. It offers ordinary, group, and credit and mortgage term insurance, as well as personal accident, health, accidental riders, etc. insurance products under treaties and facultative basis. Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THREL.BK.long_name: Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited

THYG.F.long_name: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited
THYG.F.summary: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells frozen, chilled, and canned seafood in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Ambient Seafood; Frozen and Chilled Seafood and Related Businesses; and Pet food, Value-Added and Other Businesses. It offers ambient seafood products, including tuna, sardines, salmon, mackerel, herring, and salmon for retail and wholesale customers; frozen and chilled seafood, such as shrimp, lobster, and crab sold directly to restaurants, hotels, and caterers; ready-to-cook or ready-to-serve products, as well as bakery treats; marine ingredients for use in consumer goods, such as infant formula, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and clinical nutrition; and pet care products comprising surimi-based fish snacks, canned cod liver, and wet seafood-based cat and dog foods. The company provides its products under the Chicken of the Sea, Genova, John West, Petit Navire, Parmentier, King Oscar, Mareblu, RÃ¼gen Fisch, Sealect, Fisho, QFresh, Monori, Bellotta, and Marvo brands. It also manufactures and distributes canned tuna and seafood, pet food, frozen shrimps, animal feeds, frozen foods and aquatic animals, ingredients, canned sardines and mackerel, and smoked salmon. In addition, the company offers printing manufacturing, logistic, training and management, e-commerce, consultancy, technical, and property rental services. Further, it is involved in the packaging, tuna oil refinery, and shrimp breeding and hatchery businesses. The company was formerly known as Thai Union Frozen Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Union Group Public Company Limited in September 2015. Thai Union Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TIGER-R.BK.long_name: Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited
TIGER-R.BK.summary: Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in construction and interior service business. It is also involved in the business of aluminum installation and sale of construction materials. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Bang Kruai, Thailand.

TIGER.BK.long_name: Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited
TIGER.BK.summary: Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in construction and interior service business. It is also involved in the business of aluminum installation and sale of construction materials. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Bang Kruai, Thailand.

TIP-R.BK.summary: Dhipaya Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company offers residential and general fire insurance products; marine insurance products; compulsory and voluntary motor insurance products; and personal, property, and third-party insurance products. It is also involved in investment activities. Dhipaya Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TIPCO-R.BK.summary: Tipco Foods Public Company Limited produces and distributes processed fruits, fresh fruits, fruit juices, vegetable juices, natural mineral water, and ready-to-drink beverages in Thailand. It operates through Products of Vegetable & Fruit, Beverage, and Other segments. The company offers processed fruit products that include canned pineapple, pineapple juice concentrate, canned mixed fruits, aseptic crushed pineapple, pineapple in plastic cup, pineapple in retort pouch, canned tropical fruit salad, tropical fruit salad in plastic cup, canned aloe vera, aseptic crushed aloe vera, aloe vera in retort pouch, coconut milk products, and dehydrated pineapple core and mango, as well as coconut water. It also produces plant and herbal extracts that serve as ingredients for foods, beverages, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and medicines. In addition, the company produces and distributes ready-to-drink fruit juices and vegetable juices; and ready-to-drink beverages. Further, it operates 28 Squeeze Juice Bar by Tipco shops, including 17 company branches and 11 franchise branches that serve smoothies, and healthy drinks and foods. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Thai Pineapple PLC. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TISCO-R.BK.long_name: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited
TISCO-R.BK.summary: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited provides commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking Business, Securities Business, and Asset Management Business segments. The company accepts deposit products, such as current accounts, savings accounts, fixed deposit accounts, and certificates of deposit, as well as cards and bill payment services. It also provides personal loans, such as home loan, new and used car loans, and loans against inheritance pension; and corporate loans, including project and long term loans, short term loans, and guarantee products. In addition, the company offers investment services, including stock and derivative brokerage, mutual funds, private funds, and provident funds, as well as super savings fund /retirement mutual funds; and insurance services, such as life, retirement, health and critical illness, personal accident, car, and home insurance. Further, it provides investment banking services that financial advisory and underwriting for merger and acquisition, privatization advisory and implementation, project financing, debt restructuring, feasibility study, project valuation, general advisory, etc.; and private banking, and wealth and asset management services. Additionally, the company offers mobile banking, custodian, assets for sale, car auction, hire purchase, and SME lending services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated through a network of 347 branches under the Somwang brand. TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TKN-R.BK.long_name: Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited
TKN-R.BK.summary: Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes fried, grilled, and baked seaweed and seaweed snacks in Thailand, China, Malaysia, Indonesia, Vietnam, the United States, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Snacks, Retailer, and Others. It also operates as a retailer of snacks, and food and beverage products. In addition, the company is involved in the distribution of snacks and souvenirs; manufacture and distribution of seasoning powders; and restaurant business. Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Lat Lum Kaeo, Thailand.

TKS-R.BK.summary: T.K.S. Technologies Public Company Limited manufactures and sells continuous paper forms, securities printing products, and other printing and continuous labels primarily in Thailand and internationally. The company's products include digital print and mail forms, cheque on demand forms, warehouse management forms, advance forms, business forms, office papers, plastic cards, and flexible packaging products, as well as security form products, such as cheuqe, passbook, examination paper, security document, coupon, and gift voucher. It is also involved in the provision of information technology and software consultancy services, and warehouse and logistics management service. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TKT-R.BK.summary: T.Krungthai Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic parts in Thailand. The company also designs, manufactures, sells, and repairs plastic injection molds. It serves automotive, electrical appliance, and packaging industries, as well as original equipment manufacturers. T.Krungthai Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TM.BK.summary: Techno Medical Public Company Limited trades in medical supplies, tools, and equipment in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Disposable Equipment and Supplies, and Medical Equipment and Instrument. Techno Medical Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TMB.BK.summary: TMB Bank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides various commercial banking products and services to personal, small and medium sized enterprises, and corporate customers primarily in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking and Retail Banking segments. The company offers transactional, current accounts, savings, term deposits, multi-currency accounts, cash concentration and liquid accounts, and foreign currency deposits; supply chain solutions; personal and home loans, overdraft and construction loans, unsecured loans, letter of guarantee products, and working capital facilities; advisory services; loans for purchasing operating premises; and credit cards. It also provides mutual funds products; personal accident, life and health, motor, property, and travel insurance products; wealth banking products; mobile and Internet banking services; trade products and risk management by capital market products; payment, cash collection, and liquidity management services; custodian, fund supervisory, registrar and paying agent, fund accounting, and other agency services; debt capital market, loan arrangement and syndication, debt instrument, and merger and acquisition services, as well as property fund services for public offering; and digital banking, and bancassurance and business protection products. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It operates through Commercial Banking and Retail Banking segments. The company offers transactional, current accounts, savings, term deposits, multi-currency accounts, cash concentration and liquid accounts, and foreign currency deposits; supply chain solutions; personal and home loans, overdraft and construction loans, unsecured loans, letter of guarantee products, and working capital facilities; advisory services; loans for purchasing operating premises; and credit cards. It also provides mutual funds products; personal accident, life and health, motor, property, and travel insurance products; wealth banking products; mobile and Internet banking services; trade products and risk management by capital market products; payment, cash collection, and liquidity management services; custodian, fund supervisory, registrar and paying agent, fund accounting, and other agency services; debt capital market, loan arrangement and syndication, debt instrument, and merger and acquisition services, as well as property fund services for public offering; and digital banking, and bancassurance and business protection products. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TMC-R.BK.summary: T.M.C. Industrial Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes hydraulic machinery and handling equipment in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Manufacture and Distribution of Machinery; Services; and Project Construction Service. The company offers hydraulic presses, including hydraulic clapper die spotting, hydraulic die spotting, hydraulic try out, hydraulic deep drawing, hydraulic hemming, hydraulic molding for hot, hydraulic trimming and bending, and hydraulic special presses, as well as provides automation machines for interior material. It also provides material handling equipment, such as hydraulic hand pallet trucks, table lifts, drum carrier trucks, X-lifts, stackers, hydraulic lift elevators, and dock levelers; and motorcycle lifters and full rise scissor lifts. In addition, the company offers automatic parking lifts, such as two post parking, two post tilt parking, scissor ranking, four post parking, four post double wide, three floors valet vertical parking level parking, three level parking, pit design parking, and rotatory parking lifts. Further, it provides mobile cranes, such as knuckle and telescoping boom cranes, and container lifts; hydraulic static pile drivers; presses mechanical and hydraulic isgec; special materials; and hydraulic cylinders and power units; and home elevators. Additionally, the company offers machine repair and maintenance, and metal machining services. T.M.C. Industrial Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

TMD-R.BK.long_name: Thai Metal Drum Manufacturing Public Company Limited
TMD-R.BK.summary: Thai Metal Drum Manufacturing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes metal drums in Thailand. The company offers steel and plastic drums for the storage and transportation of lubricant oils, petrochemicals, chemicals, agriculture products, food products, and other products; polyethylene terepthalate plastic bottles and preforms; and polypropylene corrugated sheets to the drinking water and beverage companies. It is also involved in the rental of Lake Rajada office complex with a total leasing space of 51,730 square meters located in the business district on Rachadapisek road, Thailand, as well as trading business. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TMI-R.BK.summary: Teera-Mongkol Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and distributes electric lighting equipment and related equipment in Thailand. The company offers a range of ballasts for fluorescent lamps, compact fluorescent lamps, and HID lamps for electronic and magnetic types; and control gear products, such as ignitors, photo switches, change over switches, and transformers for halogen lamps. It also exports its products to distributors in Bangladesh, Vietnam, Cambodia, Myanmar, Laos, Syria, Saudi Arabia, and Egypt. In addition, the company generates and sells electricity from biogas and alternative energy sources. Teera-Mongkol Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TMILL-R.BK.short_name: T S FLOUR MILL PUBLIC COMPANY L
TMILL-R.BK.long_name: T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited
TMILL-R.BK.summary: T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited produces and distributes wheat flour in Thailand. The company also trades in, imports, and exports wheat, wheat products, and other grains. Its products are used in various bakery and food products, such as bread, noodles, instant noodles, pizza, donut, biscuit, steamed bun, deep-fried stick dough, flat bread, biscuit sponge cake, and cake. The company was formerly known as Thai Sugar Inter Trade Company Limited and changed its name to T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited in 2005. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand. T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai Sugar Terminal Public Co., Ltd.

TMLF.F.summary: TMB Bank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides various commercial banking products and services to personal, small and medium sized enterprises, and corporate customers primarily in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking and Retail Banking segments. The company offers transactional, current accounts, savings, term deposits, multi-currency accounts, cash concentration and liquid accounts, and foreign currency deposits; supply chain solutions; personal and home loans, overdraft and construction loans, unsecured loans, letter of guarantee products, and working capital facilities; advisory services; loans for purchasing operating premises; and credit cards. It also provides mutual funds products; personal accident, life and health, motor, property, and travel insurance products; wealth banking products; mobile and Internet banking services; trade products and risk management by capital market products; payment, cash collection, and liquidity management services; custodian, fund supervisory, registrar and paying agent, fund accounting, and other agency services; debt capital market, loan arrangement and syndication, debt instrument, and merger and acquisition services, as well as property fund services for public offering; and digital banking, and bancassurance and business protection products. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TMT.BK.summary: Tmt Steel Public Company Limited sells and transforms structural steel, plates, and sheets primarily in Thailand. It offers flat products, including hot rolled sheets and plates, flat bars, slitting coils, and checkered plates; cold forming products, including round, rectangular, square, primer coated, and galvanized steel tubes, as well as pipes, light channel and angle, and primer coated and galvanized c channel. The company also provides hot formed steel products, such as H- section, cut, and I-section beam, as well as round and deformed bars, equal angle, and channel. In addition, it provides steel processing and cold forming services. The company was formerly known as Thai Metal Trade Public Company Limited. Tmt Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TMW-R.BK.summary: Thai Mitsuwa Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic and magnesium products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers plastic parts for use in automotive parts and home appliances; and magnesium parts that are used in automobiles, computers, mobile phones, cameras, etc. It also manufactures and trades in molds. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Muang, Thailand. Thai Mitsuwa Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Mitsuwa Electric Industry Co., Ltd.

TNDT-R.BK.long_name: Thai Nondestructive Testing Public Company Limited
TNDT-R.BK.summary: Thai Nondestructive Testing Public Company Limited, a technical service company, provides nondestructive engineering services in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Nondestructive Testing Services, and Inspection Services for Pressure Vessel and Others. The company offers a range of conventional inspection services, including ultrasonic, radiography, eddy current, magnetic particle, liquid penetrant, positive material identification, and visual services. It also provides advance nondestructive testing technology and inspection techniques, such as above ground storage tank program, pipeline radiography, small controlled area radiography, remote visual inspection, positive material identification, and liquid pressure test packs. In addition, the company engages in the rendering excavation and transportation services of coal for the coal mine concessionaire; generation and sale of electricity from coal-fired thermal power; and procurement and servicing of public utility systems and other related businesses, as well as offers advisory services for engineering. Further, it provides engineering inspection and nondestructive testing of pressure vessels, heat exchangers, boilers, piping, and structures in the fields of oil refinery, power plant, petrochemical plant, ship building, offshore, bridge and building construction, and other various heavy industries. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNH-R.BK.long_name: Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited
TNH-R.BK.summary: Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited engages in the hospital business in Thailand. The company offers medical services in the areas of heart, bone and joint, holistic oncology, hemodialysis, skin and laser, traditional Chinese medicine, ear, nose, throat, pediatrics, obstetrics, gynecology, medicine, dental, surgery, emergency, physical therapy, gastrointestinal, breast care, lasik, diabetes, endocrinology, brain, neurology, hepato-biliary, pancreas, X-ray, and eye, as well as operates check-up centers. Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNITY-R.BK.summary: Trinity Watthana Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Securities and Derivatives Business; and Financial Advisory Business and Investment Banking. The company is involved in the broking, trading, borrowing and lending, and underwriting of securities. It also provides investment advisory, private fund asset management, and financial advisory services, as well as operates as a derivatives agent. In addition, the company invests in other companies and listed companies. As of December 31, 2020, it had 6 branches. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNL-R.BK.summary: Thanulux Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes finished garments and leather products for men, women and children in Thailand. It offers shirts, T-shirts, trousers, jeans, suits, jackets, pajamas, underwear, neckties, socks, maternity wear, swimsuits, and sportswear, as well as leather goods comprising wallets, handbags, and belts. The company also provides garments for infants to 8 year-olds; and diapers, bedding, shoes, socks, dolls, and accessories for toddlers. In addition, the company manufactures and exports various other products; and manufactures uniforms, Buddhist monk triple robes, and white robes for practice of dharma under the Thammarat and Thammasorn brand, as well as green living products under the SRIDA brand. Thanulux Public Company Limited exports its products to Europe, Asia, the United States, Australia, and South Africa. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNP-R.BK.summary: Thanapiriya Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates wholesale and retail superstores in Thailand. It owns 32 superstores and 2 distribution centers. Thanapiriya Public Company Limited founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Mueang Chiang Rai, Thailand.

TNPC-R.BK.long_name: Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited
TNPC-R.BK.summary: Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited engages in the production and distribution of flexible plastic, synthetic leather, and car mats in Thailand and internationally. It offers polyvinyl chloride (PVC), foam sheet, PP foam leather, thermoplastic olefin, and rigid PVC. The company also exports its products. Its products have applications in automotive, sports shoes and balls, furniture, leather, civil engineering, and agriculture industries. Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Samutsakorn, Thailand.

TNR.BK.long_name: Thai Nippon Rubber Industry Public Co., Ltd.
TNR.BK.summary: Thai Nippon Rubber Industry Public Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes condoms and lubricating gels under the Onetouch name in Thailand. It also manufactures paper packaging products. The company sells its products through retailers and distributors. It sells its products in approximately 100 countries, including Europe, Africa, the United States, the Middle East, and internationally. Thai Nippon Rubber Industry Public Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TOA.BK.summary: TOA Paint (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes paints and chemicals in Thailand, Vietnam, Laos, Myanmar, Cambodia, Indonesia, and Malaysia. The company offers construction chemicals, special paints, and hardware and power tools, as well as decorative, wood, and heavy duty coatings. TOA Paint (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Bang Sao Thong, Thailand.

TOG.BK.long_name: Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited
TOG.BK.summary: Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic lens and related products in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Plastic and Glass Lens; and Other Products and Services. The Plastic and Glass Lens segment produces and sells optical lenses. It offers CR39, photochromic, high index, high impact resistant, sunÂfiltered, and polarized lenses; and mineral and prescription lenses. The Other Products and Services segment is involved in the sale of glass molds; trade of goods purchased for resale; surface treatment of hard coatings; as well as anti-reflection coating services for organic lenses. The company distributes its products on an original equipment manufacturer basis, as well as under its Excelite, Excelite Trivex, Excelite Tribrid, ONE, Discovery, freedom, and MAXIMA brands. It also exports its products to Europe, Australia, rest of Asia and Pacific, the United States, Africa, and the Middle East. Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited serves wholesalers and retailers. The company was formerly known as Thai Polymer Lens Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited in 2004. Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bang Bua Thong, Thailand.

TOIPF.summary: Thai Oil Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the oil refining and distribution, petrochemicals, lube base oil, and other businesses in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Oil Refinery, Lube Base Oil Refinery, Petrochemical, Power Generation, Marine Transportation Services, Solvent, Ethanol, and Others segments. The company produces gasoline, diesel/gas oil, jet fuel, kerosene, fuel oil, and liquefied petroleum gas; and petrochemical products, such as paraxylene, benzene, toluene, and mixed xylenes. It also produces and distributes lube base oil, bitumen/asphalt, and other by-products, as well as special products, such as treated distillate aromatics extract and slack wax; and hydrocarbon and chemical solvents, and other chemicals. In addition, the company operates natural gas-fired combined-cycle co-generation power plants that generate and sell electricity, steam, and utilities to industrial users, as well as invests in other power generating companies and related business. Further, it is involved in the marine transportation of petroleum, petrochemical, and liquid chemical products; production of ethanol; provision of marine transportation services for crew and utilities; and biogas power generation and distribution. Additionally, the company provides human resource management services; and manufactures and sells linear alkyl benzene and related products. Thai Oil Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

Thai Oil Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TOPP-R.BK.summary: Thai O.P.P. Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic films, stickers, laminate tubes, and packaging products in Thailand. It offers plastic films, such as polyolefin shrink, oriented polypropylene heat sealable, skin vacuum, cast polypropylene (CPP), metallized, stretch, blown linear low-density polypropylene, CPP breathable, and protection films; films for lamination; CPP peels; shrink machines; and stretchable labels, as well as LLDPE stretch films for pallet wraps. Its products are used in food, cosmetic, medical product, and other consumer goods and industrial packaging industries. Thai O.P.P. Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPA-R.BK.long_name: Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited
TPA-R.BK.summary: Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of acrylic, acrylonitrile butadiene styrene, high impact polystyrene, and other extruded plastic sheets in Thailand and internationally. The company offers general purpose, impact modified cast, sanitary ware, magic color, and LED block acrylic sheets, as well as light management solutions and acrylic diffusion products. It also provides extruded products, including ABS/HI.PS sheets, HD and LDPE.Net, PMMA and PS pattern, and PVC boards, as well as polypropylene profiles/boards/corrugated sheets under the ComPlas, MODEN PLAS, MAGIC COLOR, MODEN GLAS, and SuperGlas brands. Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Sam Phran, Thailand.

TPAC-R.BK.summary: Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic packaging products in Thailand, India, and the United Arab Emirates. Its products include rigid plastic packaging materials, bottles and closure systems, containers, plastic-wares, and others. The company serves food and beverage, pharmaceutical, homecare, personal care, and industrial sectors. Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPBI-R.BK.summary: TPBI Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes plastic bags and other types of packaging products in Thailand. It offers plastic bags, such as loop and tape handle, flat and satchel, block and bottom, die cut, SOS, and fashion bags; woven, jute, and hybrid bags; piping bags for the use in whipping up pastries, cake, and other confectioneries; vest carrier/T-shirt bags, bio-compostable bags, and fruits and vegetables bags that are used in trade, supermarket, and convenient stores; garbage bags for garbage handling in trade, supermarket, and convenient stores; and LDPE zipper/food storage bags that are used in food protection, moisture, reusable, and resealable for food items. The company also manufactures multilayer blown films, including barrier films, which are used as a packaging for fresh food; lamination films for using in flexible packaging for food products; and stretch hoods and shrink films. In addition, it offers flexible packaging for frozen food, ready-to-eat food, and others in various package types; and mailing and reusable bags. Further, the company provides services for molding, cutting, and film-blowing for plastic bags; produces machines for plastic bags production; produces and distributes paper cups and bowls; and trades in paper and plastic packaging products. Additionally, it offers hygiene products, such as disposable masks, alcohol sprays, hand sanitizers, infrared forehead thermometers, and isolation medical waste bags; digital printing services; and plastic pellet compounds for production of various plastic products. TPBI Public Company Limited also exports its products to Australia, the United Kingdom, the United States, Japan, Singapore, Myanmar, Vietnam, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Thai Plastic Bags Industries Co., Ltd. TPBI Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

TPCORP-R.BK.summary: TPCS Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells non-woven fabric products in Thailand and internationally. It offers non-woven fabrics for headlining interiors, truck liners, and seat back interiors; air cabin filters; sun shades made from polyester fabrics; pocket nets for seat backs; handle adjust reclining release for car seats; and rigid tapes. The company also provides health care products, including face mask, back support products, wrist and ankle support products, and caps and gowns; filters for air conditioners; high tenacity belts for the boat sail industry; seat and net bags for aircraft interiors; fiber non-woven, and glue and lining fabrics; sponge shoulders pads and shapes, breasts, and fabric laminates; sport shirts; and blankets, pillow products, cloth napkins, bolsters, cushions, baby bedding sets, and cloth diapers. In addition, it is involved in the hire of works. The company serves automotive, industrial, healthcare, and home textile industries. The company was formerly known as Textile Prestige Public Company Limited and changed its name to TPCS Public Company Limited in April 2021. TPCS Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPIG.F.summary: IRPC Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides petroleum and petrochemical products in Thailand, Singapore, and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum Products, Petrochemical Products, and Other Business segments. It offers petroleum products, including liquefied petroleum gas, naphtha, gasoline, diesel, and fuel oil; lube base oil and asphalt; petrochemical products, such as olefins, such as ethylene, propylene, and butadiene; aromatics comprising benzene, toluene, and mixylene; polymers consisting of high-density polyethylene, polypropylene, acrylonitrile-butadiene-styrene, acrylonitrile styrene, polystyrene, and expandable polystyrene; and polyols. It also provides electricity, steam, and infrastructure, including wastewater treatment and other related services to industrial clients. In addition, the company offers port and tank services, such as tug boats, port pilots, service boats, mooring, freshwater, bunkers, nautical charts, cranes, hopper cars, weighing, cargo yards, and warehouses, as well as operates bulk and container, liquid and chemical, and oil-cargo terminals. Further, it is involved in the provision of asset management and oil vessel renting services; manufacture and distribution of plastic resins; operation of vocational schools; and distribution of petrochemical products, as well as power plant, jetty, and other utilities operations. The company was formerly known as Thai Petrochemical Industry Public Company Limited and changed its name to IRPC Public Company Limited in October 2006. IRPC Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

TPIPL-R.BK.summary: TPI Polene Public Company Limited engages in the cement, construction materials, and plastic businesses in Thailand, China, Bangladesh, and internationally. It operates through four segments: Construction Materials, Petrochemical & Chemicals, Energy & Utilities, and Agriculture. The company manufactures and distributes cement products comprising Portland, mixed, masonry, hydraulic, and oil well cement; organic fertilizers for aquatic, livestock, and plants; and fiber cement roof tiles, wood replacements, fiber cement boards, digital boards, and fiber cement accessories. It also offers concrete roof, and floor and wall concrete tiles, as well as concrete roof tile accessories; masonry, plastering, floor screed, DIY, specific purpose, and dry concrete mortars; and soaps, including hand and body wash, oil removal, and cleaning detergents. In addition, the company provides clear coat, interior and exterior, wall, water proof, floor, and artistic paints; low density polyethylene and ethylene vinyl acetate copolymer resins; and ready mixed concrete. Further, it offers tile grout, block, and drinking water products; distributes gasoline, diesel, and natural gas; manufactures and distributes refuse derived fuel, organics waste, melt sheets, nitric acids, and ammonium nitrate; and generates and distributes electricity. Additionally, the company engages in retailing, petroleum exploration, property development, export and import, and construction businesses. TPI Polene Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPI Polene Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPIPP-R.BK.long_name: TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited
TPIPP-R.BK.summary: TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity in Thailand. It operates through Energy & Utilities and Petrol and Gas Stations segments. The company operates refuse derived fuel fired, coal-fired, waste-to-energy, and waste-heat recovery power plants. It sells its electricity to the electricity generating authority of Thailand. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated eight power plants with a total installed power generation capacity of 440 megawatt, as well as eight petrol stations, three petrol and gas stations, and a gas station under the TPIPP brand. It also manufactures and distributes organics waste. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of TPI Polene Public Company Limited.

TPLAS-R.BK.long_name: Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) Public Company Limited
TPLAS-R.BK.summary: Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic bags and food wrapping films in Thailand. Its products include polypropylene, high-density polyetehylene, and T-shirt high density polyethylene bags, as well as side gusseted products and PVC cling films. Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) markets its products under the Makrook brand. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

TPLAS.BK.long_name: Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) Public Company Limited

Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) markets its products under the Makrook brand. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

TPOLY-R.BK.summary: Thai Polycons Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It undertakes construction of building, commercial building, power plant, infrastructure, hospital, and residential building projects. The company also engages in the property development activities; trading business; and production and trading of electricity. In addition, it invests in energy business. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPP-R.BK.long_name: Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited
TPP-R.BK.summary: Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes box packaging products in Thailand. The company offers corrugated boxed and white paper printed products in offset designs for various segments, including automotive, electric, medical appliance, food and beverage, houseware, fast-moving consumer, toy, and miscellaneous. Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TPRIME.BK.long_name: Thailand Prime Property Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
TPRIME.BK.summary: Thailand Prime Property Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust externally managed by SCCP REIT Company Limited. The firm invest in leasehold rights over the Mercury Tower Project and acquiring at least 99.99 per cent. of shares of Exchange Tower Co.,Ltd which owns the Exchange Tower Project. Thailand Prime Property Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPS-R.BK.long_name: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited
TPS-R.BK.summary: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited provides solutions for network computing and e-business. It engages in the distribution and installation of computer network systems, fully integrated communication systems, wireless communication systems, network security systems, and data center solutions and management systems. The company also offers consultancy services, such as LAN/WAN infrastructure, intranet/Internet, security system, IP telephony, network management system, design and best practice recommendation, network troubleshooting, and network equipment assessment. In addition, it provides network system management and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPY1.F.summary: Tipco Asphalt Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes asphalt and petroleum products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers asphalt cement, cutback asphalt, asphalt emulsion, modified asphalt emulsion, and premium grade asphalt products; special products, including premixes, joint sealers, joint primers, jet fuel resistant joint sealants, and binders for tropical bridges; and industrial lubricants, as well as naphtha, and gas and fuel oil products. It also engages in shipping management and agency, and marine transportation activities. The company owns, operates, and manages a fleet of eight asphalt tankers. Tipco Asphalt Public Company Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TQM-R.BK.summary: TQM Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the insurance brokerage business in Thailand. The company offers life and non-life insurance products that include car, travel, accident, health, life, home, motorbike, and influenza and dengue insurance. It also provides IT and software services. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. TQM Corporation Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Eternal Growth Corporation Company Limited.

TQR-R.BK.summary: TQR Public Company Limited provides reinsurance broker and integrated risk transfer services in Thailand. It offers treaty and facultative reinsurance services; and motor car, motorcycle, extended warranty, travel, cyber security, medical malpractice. and director and officer liability insurance services. TQR Public Company Limited was founded in 2012 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TQR Public Company Limited was founded in 2012 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TR-R.BK.summary: Thai Rayon Public Company Limited manufactures and sells viscose rayon staple fiber and anhydrous sodium sulphate products in Thailand. It offers viscose rayon staple fiber that is used in textile and non-woven applications under the Birla Cellulose brand name; and anhydrous sodium sulphate for use in detergent, pulp, glass, leather, and textile industries, as well as manufactures and sells pulp. The company also exports its products. Thai Rayon Public Company Limited was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRC.BK.summary: TRC Construction Public Company Limited provides construction services in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Pipeline System Construction, Engineering System, Civil Work Construction, and Sales and Other Services. It primarily provides engineering design, procurement, construction, and construction management services. The company also engages in pipeline system construction, engineering system installation, and factory construction in energy and petrochemical industries, as well as project development and investment business in energy, real estate, power plant, and petrochemical sectors. In addition, it constructs roads, water systems, bridge, wastewater treatment system, dam, water distribution system, railway, water supply, and airport facilities, as well as other infrastructure; underground electrical conduits, including boring and pipe jacking work; and produces and distributes tap water, as well as offers data management and processing services. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRITN-R.BK.summary: Triton Holding Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction and engineering business in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Constructions Business, and Electricity and Energy Business. It constructs non-residential buildings; and provides land and building rental services. The company also engages in the mining and construction material supply; electricity generation from solar, wind, hydro, biogas, and waste; waste management; sale of radio taps and radio compact discs; and alternative energy resource and mining businesses. In addition, it is involved in provision of directional drilling contract business, which performs works of oil, water, sewer, and gas pipelines, as well as fiber optic cables; management of real estate; film production and distribution; showcasing; radio business; and production of TV programs for pay TV businesses. The company was formerly known as Live Incorporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Triton Holding Public Company Limited in October 2015. Triton Holding Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRT-R.BK.summary: Tirathai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, repairs, sells, and maintains transformer equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company offers power transformers for manufacturers and suppliers of electrical energy. It also provides various distribution transformers comprising freely breathing system, completely filled, gas cushion, inert gas pressure system, loop feed or radial feed, and power unit load center transformers. In addition, the company offers special transformers, such as rectifier transformers, which are used in chemical industrial factories; induction furnace transformers that are used in metals smelting industry; and transformers using other insulators, such as silicone oil, etc. Further, it provides transformer tank body and accessories, including covers, fins, clamps, etc.; and distributes, installs, and maintains electrical power equipment. Additionally, the company offers transformer erection and installation, oil filling, maintenance, modification and repair, testing, and equipment rental services; and custom metalwork services. Tirathai Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

TRU-R.BK.short_name: THAI RUNG UNION CAR PUBLIC COMP
TRU-R.BK.long_name: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited
TRU-R.BK.summary: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited engages in the car assembly and modification, and the manufacture and distribution of parts and molds primarily in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Car Assembly and Other Related Car Services; Manufacture of Equipment for Production of Car Accessories; and Sales of Cars, and Car Service Centre Business. It offers tooling products, including dies and molds, and assembly jigs and checking fixtures; auto parts, such as metal stamping and plastic parts; and seats and interior trim products for various motor vehicles. The company also provides contract assembly and sub-assembly services for vehicles, cargo boxes, excavator cabs, etc.; and vehicle modification and painting services. In addition, it is involved in the sale of cars, car accessories, and spare parts; and manufacture of vehicle body parts. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRUBB-R.BK.long_name: Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited
TRUBB-R.BK.summary: Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited manufactures and sells rubber and latex products in Thailand, the People's Republic of China, Islamic Republic of Pakistan, Malaysia, the Republic of Korea, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Concentrated and Prevulcanized Latex; Latex Products; and Rubber Plantation. The company produces and distributes products from natural rubber, rubber threads, and foam latex mattresses and pillows. It also trades in products from natural rubber. The company was formerly known as Thai Rubber Latex Corporation (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited in July 2019. Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TRUE.BK.summary: True Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the telecommunications and diversified communications industries in Thailand. The company operates through TrueMove H, TrueOnline, and TrueVisions segments. It offers mobile, broadband Internet, Wi-Fi, content and media, television, and digital platforms. The company is also involved in entertainment, mobile equipment lessor, program production, non-government telecommunication, artist management and related, Internet services provider and distributor, and marketing management activities. In addition, it operates news channel; and provides business solutions, online digital media services on website and telecommunication devices, distribution center services, consultancy and management services related to logistics, advertising sale and agency services, wireless telecommunication services, pay television via cable system, and football club and related activities management services. Further, the company operates as a content provider; designs, develops, produces, and sells software products; and offers data analytics and digital solutions, and hospitality technology, as well as business process outsourcing services in technical service, marketing, and customer relations. The company was formerly known as TelecomAsia Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to True Corporation Public Company Limited in April 2004. True Corporation Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSC.BK.long_name: Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited
TSC.BK.summary: Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes automobile and motorcycle control cables, and automobile window regulators in Thailand. Its products include accelerator, door lock, fuel lid opener, hood release, key inter lock, parking brake, seat belt, transmission, manual parking release, trunk opener, and engine start cables; and motorcycle products comprise brake, clutch, seat lock, speed meter, tachometer, and throttle cables. The company serves automobile and motorcycle manufacturers, and spare parts centers. It also exports its products. Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

TSE.BK.long_name: Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited
TSE.BK.summary: Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited generates and distributes electricity from solar and biomass power plants to government and private sector in Thailand and Japan. The company also leases land. As of December 31, 2020, it had 23 solar PV farm projects, 14 solar rooftop projects, and 3 biomass powerplants, with a total production capacity of 299.94 MW; and 1 solar floating project under construction with a capacity of 8 MW. The company was formerly known as Siam Solar Energy Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited in 2009. Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSI-R.BK.long_name: The Thai Setakij Insurance Public Company Limited
TSI-R.BK.summary: The Thai Setakij Insurance Public Company Limited engages in the non-life insurance business in Thailand. It offers fire, property risk, marine and transportation, motor cargo, and engineering insurance, as well as miscellaneous insurance products. The company also provides car, accident, travel, and home and condo insurance products. It serves to individual and corporate customers. The company was founded in 1942 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSI.BK.long_name: The Thai Setakij Insurance Public Company Limited

TSR-R.BK.summary: Thiensurat Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes water purifiers in Thailand. It also distributes air conditioners, water filters jugs, electric appliances, and other equipment, as well as offers personal and auto title loans. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

TSTE-R.BK.long_name: Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited
TSTE-R.BK.summary: Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the production and distribution of wheat flour in Thailand. The company is also involved in the provision transfer and transportation services for sugar and various agricultural products; and land rental and trading, land lots appropriation, and office and commercial units rental activities, as well as the construction of buildings on land for sale. In addition, it engages in the warehousing and loading of goods; property, silo, and warehouse rental activities; extraction of palm oil; and production of packing, polypropylene bag, plastic fiber, plastic resin, and plastic products, as well as operation of a port. The company was formerly known as The Thai Sugar Terminal Corporation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited in 1994. Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

TSTE.BK.long_name: Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited

In addition, it engages in the warehousing and loading of goods; property, silo, and warehouse rental activities; extraction of palm oil; and production of packing, polypropylene bag, plastic fiber, plastic resin, and plastic products, as well as operation of a port. The company was formerly known as The Thai Sugar Terminal Corporation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited in 1994. Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

TSTH-R.BK.summary: Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and trades in steel bars, wire rods, and small section products primarily in Thailand. The company offers reinforcing bars (rebar); low and high carbon wire rods; carbon wire rod for cold heading; wire rod for welding electrode; small section structural steel, consisting of angle and channel steel; carbon steel round bars; and cut and bend rebar. The company also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Millennium Steel Public Company Limited and changed its name to Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited in December 2006. Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of T S Global Holdings Pte. Ltd.

TTA-R.BK.long_name: Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited
TTA-R.BK.summary: Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a shipping service company in Thailand and internationally. It operates through five segments: Shipping, Offshore Service, Agrochemical, Food and Beverage, and Investment. The company offers dry bulk shipping services that carry iron ores, coal, grains, cements, fertilizers, and steel and forest products; ship agency and ship brokerage services; and operates dry bulk vessels for tramp services. It also provides offshore services to the oil and gas industry; and produces and markets NPK compounds, bulk blending products, and fertilizers under the Stork brand for customers' needs for coffee, rice, rubber, vegetables, and various other crops. In addition, the company owns and operates Phu My port in South Vietnam; and provides ship supplies and logistics services, including supply of ship stores, cargo dunnage materials, cargo lashing and securing equipment, cargo handling equipment, tally and checker services, forklift rental/services, and warehouses and storage spaces for rental, as well as material procurement, management, and distribution services. Further, it offers cargo loading and unloading, cargo handling, and transportation services; owns and operates a fleet of nine petroleum tankers/barges and one liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) tanker; transporting fuel, such as petroleum, ethanol, and LPG products to various ports/depots; provides water and coal supply chain management services, as well as pipeline installation and repair services; and operates and franchises Pizza Hut and Taco Bell restaurants. Additionally, the company trades in fertilizers; provides property management and drilling services; produces and sells treated water; and engages in the lifestyle and entertainment businesses. The company was founded in 1904 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TTA.BK.long_name: Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited
TTA.BK.summary: Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a shipping service company in Thailand and internationally. It operates through five segments: Shipping, Offshore Service, Agrochemical, Food and Beverage, and Investment. The company offers dry bulk shipping services that carry iron ores, coal, grains, cements, fertilizers, and steel and forest products; ship agency and ship brokerage services; and operates dry bulk vessels for tramp services. It also provides offshore services to the oil and gas industry; and produces and markets NPK compounds, bulk blending products, and fertilizers under the Stork brand for customers' needs for coffee, rice, rubber, vegetables, and various other crops. In addition, the company owns and operates Phu My port in South Vietnam; and provides ship supplies and logistics services, including supply of ship stores, cargo dunnage materials, cargo lashing and securing equipment, cargo handling equipment, tally and checker services, forklift rental/services, and warehouses and storage spaces for rental, as well as material procurement, management, and distribution services. Further, it offers cargo loading and unloading, cargo handling, and transportation services; owns and operates a fleet of nine petroleum tankers/barges and one liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) tanker; transporting fuel, such as petroleum, ethanol, and LPG products to various ports/depots; provides water and coal supply chain management services, as well as pipeline installation and repair services; and operates and franchises Pizza Hut and Taco Bell restaurants. Additionally, the company trades in fertilizers; provides property management and drilling services; produces and sells treated water; and engages in the lifestyle and entertainment businesses. The company was founded in 1904 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TTAPY.summary: TTW Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells treated water in Thailand. The company supplies water to the Provincial Waterworks Authority in the Amphur Nakorn Chaisri, Amphur Sam Pran, and Amphur Budha Monthon areas of Nakhon Pathom; and Amphur Muang and Amphur Kratumban areas of Samut Sakhon under the water purchase agreement. It is also involved in the management of water production and distribution systems, and waste water treatment systems; and operation and maintenance of water supply project. The company was formerly known as Thai Tap Water Supply Public Company Limited and changed its name to TTW Public Company Limited in April 2014. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

TTCL-R.BK.summary: TTCL Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, procures, and constructs integrated industrial factories in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments, Energy Business, Construction Business, and Manufacturing and Distribution of White Pallets. It offers engineering design services for civil structures and utility systems, such as electricity, water, air conditioning, solid and wastewater treatment systems, storage tanks, production processes, and petrochemical and chemical plants, as well as procurement of machinery and equipment, and plant construction. The company also generates and sells electricity to the government through natural gas-fired power plants and solar power plants, as well as invests and develops renewable energy power plants and invests in energy business. In addition, TTCL Public Company Limited offers conceptual study, pre-feasibility study, and detailed feasibility study services. The company was formerly known as Toyo-Thai Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to TTCL Public Company Limited in April 2015. TTCL Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TTI.BK.long_name: Thai Textile Industry Public Company Limited
TTI.BK.summary: Thai Textile Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, imports, exports, sells, and distributes raw cotton fibers, cotton yarns, blended yarns, synthetic yarns, greige fabrics, dyed fabrics, and yarn dyed fabrics in Thailand and internationally. It also provides finished garments under the TTI brand name. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

TTT-R.BK.summary: Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited, a textile company, manufactures and markets various fabric products in Thailand. It provides T/R fabrics, spun T/C fabrics, filament fabrics, denim yarns, knitted fabrics, cords, airbag fabrics, and other yarns. The company also distributes its products in the United States, Canada, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and Asia. Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Toray Industries, Inc.

TU.BK.long_name: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited
TU.BK.summary: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells frozen, chilled, and canned seafood in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Ambient Seafood; Frozen and Chilled Seafood and Related Businesses; and Pet food, Value-Added and Other Businesses. It offers ambient seafood products, including tuna, sardines, salmon, mackerel, herring, and salmon for retail and wholesale customers; frozen and chilled seafood, such as shrimp, lobster, and crab sold directly to restaurants, hotels, and caterers; ready-to-cook or ready-to-serve products, as well as bakery treats; marine ingredients for use in consumer goods, such as infant formula, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and clinical nutrition; and pet care products comprising surimi-based fish snacks, canned cod liver, and wet seafood-based cat and dog foods. The company provides its products under the Chicken of the Sea, Genova, John West, Petit Navire, Parmentier, King Oscar, Mareblu, RÃ¼gen Fisch, Sealect, Fisho, QFresh, Monori, Bellotta, and Marvo brands. It also manufactures and distributes canned tuna and seafood, pet food, frozen shrimps, animal feeds, frozen foods and aquatic animals, ingredients, canned sardines and mackerel, and smoked salmon. In addition, the company offers printing manufacturing, logistic, training and management, e-commerce, consultancy, technical, and property rental services. Further, it is involved in the packaging, tuna oil refinery, and shrimp breeding and hatchery businesses. The company was formerly known as Thai Union Frozen Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Union Group Public Company Limited in September 2015. Thai Union Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

The company operates through Selling and Installation of Solar-Cell Systems, Distribution SolarÂCell, Sale of Electricity, Hire of Work, and Other segments. It also constructs solar power plants; and produces and distributes electricity from solar energy. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TVD-R.BK.summary: TV Direct Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, sells goods and services through various marketing channels. It sells health and beauty products, household products, kitchen utensils, exercise products, and fashion products through the satellite and digital television, cable TV, outdoor call centers, printed media, websites, and mobile applications, as well as retail distribution through TVD shop. The company also produces and sells TV programs, and sells airtime for advertising, as well as offers data center, and life insurance brokerage and other services. As of June 30, 2020, it operated 69 distribution centers in Bangkok and other provinces. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company's insurance products include fire, marine and transportation, motor, and personal and travel accident, health, compensation indemnity, critical illness, contractor all risks, burglary, health, and global travel. It also provides reinsurance products. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TVO-R.BK.long_name: Thai Vegetable Oil Public Company Limited
TVO-R.BK.summary: Thai Vegetable Oil Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes soy meal and soybean oil primarily in Thailand. It provides soybean oil for household cooking purposes, as well as corn, sunflower, and canola oils under the A-NGOON brand; soybean meal for the production of animal feed under the TVO HiproÂMeal brand; and vegetable oils under the Healthy Chef and Queen brands. The company also offers olive oils under the MONINI brand; dehulled soymeal under the TVO Dehulled Soymeal brand; full fat soy under the TVO Full Fat Soy brand; dehulled full fat soy under the TVO Dehulled Full Fat Soy brand; TVO soy hull and lecithin products; TVO crude degummed soybean oil; and fish canned products. In addition, it manufactures and distributes packaging products; and distributes consumer products. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TWP-R.BK.long_name: Thai Wire Products Public Company Limited
TWP-R.BK.summary: Thai Wire Products Public Company Limited engages in the manufacturing and sale of prestessed concrete wires in Thailand and internationally. Its products include steel wires and strands for prestressed concrete, galvanized steel wires and strands, cold drawn steel wires for concrete reinforcement, hard drawn steel wires, and ordinary low carbon steel wires. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

TWPC-R.BK.summary: Thai Wah Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes starch and other agricultural products in Thailand, Vietnam, Cambodia, and China. Its products include tapioca starch, which is used in the food industry, such as seasoning powder and sweetener products, as well as in other industries, such as paper and textile; tapioca pearl that is used in cooking savory dishes and desserts; alpha starch, which is used in the aquatic animal feed, mosquito repellent, and metal casting industries; and glucose and candy products. The company also provides vermicelli, bean vermicelli, rice vermicelli, rice flour, roselle flower, pandanus leaf, and other products. In addition, it is also involved in land holding activities; and generation and sale of electricity; and wholesale trading of tapioca starch products, rice flour products, and other starch-related products. Thai Wah Public Company Limited was founded in 1947 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TWZ-R.BK.summary: TWZ Corporation Public Company Limited primarily engages in communication equipment trading business in Thailand. It operates through Communication Equipment Trading, Real Estate Development, Generate and Selling Electricity Plasma, and Investment Property segments. The company distributes mobile phones, spare parts, SIM and pre-paid cards, and related accessories; and operates as a service center of telecommunication equipment. It also provides counter services for payment of service fee of mobile phones; develops and rents real estate projects; and generates and sells electricity through renewable energy. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TX3A.F.summary: Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited engages in developing, managing, and operating international airports in Thailand. The company operates through Airport Business, Hotel Business, Ground Aviation Services, and Security Business segments. It operates six international airports, including Suvarnabhumi, Don Mueang, Chiang Mai, Hat Yai, Phuket, and Mae Fah Luang Chiang Rai airports. The company is also involved in the hotel and restaurant business; and services or rental of ground equipment, as well as provides security services. Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited was founded in 1903 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TYCN-R.BK.summary: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and exports steel wire rods, steel annealing wires, reinforced concrete bars, steel screws, and wire products in Thailand. It also provides spheroidized annealing wires, bolts, and thread rods; and engages in trading activities. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Rayong, Thailand. Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Tycoons Group International Co., Ltd.

U.BK.summary: U City Public Company Limited operates as a diversified real estate investment and development company in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Hotel Business, Rental Business, and Management Business segments. It provides securities investment, property ownership and management, consulting, office and commercial rental, and land and structure leasing services; and operates and manages hotels, golf courses, and sports clubs. The company was formerly known as Natural Park Public Company Limited and changed its name to U City Public Company Limited in April 2015. U City Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UAC-R.BK.summary: UAC Global Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, imports and distributes various chemicals and equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company provides consulting and advising services for the marketing of products and services; and feasibility study of various projects or works related to energy, refinery, and petrochemical industries, as well as plants and other utilities. It also produces and distributes biogas that are used in power generation, transportation, and various other industries; and produces and distributes petroleum products, including compressed natural gas, liquefied petroleum gas, and natural gas liquids. In addition, the company generates and distributes electricity, alternative energy, and fuel briquette; produces and distributes tap water and related equipment; and manufactures and distributes chemical products for the general industry. Its products are used in various industries, such as off-shore natural gas exploration and production, oil refinery and upstream petrochemicals, engine oil lubricant manufacturing plants, polymer and plastic manufacturing plants, chemical industrial plants, power plants, and other utilities systems, as well as textile, paper, and construction industrial systems. The company was formerly known as Universal Adsorbents & Chemicals Public Company Limited and changed its name to UAC Global Public Company Limited in April 2014. UAC Global Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It serves can manufacturers producing food cans, beverage cans, aerosol cans, and other general cans. Ubis (Asia) Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UEC-R.BK.summary: Unimit Engineering Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, shop fabrication, field installation, and erection of steel products and construction works in Thailand and internationally. It offers pressure vessels, including cryogenic/ISO tanks, columns/towers, shell and tube heat exchangers, spherical tanks, and vessels/drums, as well as LPG tanks comprising LPG aboveground and underground tanks, and transport/wagon tanks; and machinery parts, such as fan casings/pre heaters, water treatment parts, furnace casings, diverters, stacks/chimneys, and other products. The company also provides storage tanks, including API storage tanks and silo/hopper products; steel structures, piping shop fabrication products, and platforms/ladders; and mechanical installation services, such as piping and equipment installations, module works, and shut down/modification work services. Unimit Engineering Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Phrapradaeng, Thailand.

In addition, the company sells pharmaceutical and medical products, fragrances and skin-care cosmetics, and supplements. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It is also involved in the sale of mineral and soil, real estate, and ceramic agent activities. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company also engages in the provision of port and barge transportation services; and generating and distributing electricity from other renewable energy, such as wind power, biomass, solar energy, and others. It serves medium and small sized industries, such as food and beverage, pulp and paper, textile, and cement industries. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Unique Mining Services Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Athene Holding Co., Ltd.

UNIQ-R.BK.long_name: Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited
UNIQ-R.BK.summary: Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction contracting and real estate development businesses in Thailand. Its projects include steel bridges, reinforced concrete bridges, tunnel beneath the intersections, concrete-surfaced or asphaltic concrete roads, public utility works, structural works, building works, dam and retaining walls, etc. The company also leases service machinery; manufactures construction materials; sells sand; produces concrete ready mix and precast concrete; and offers steel fabrication, assembly and survey, and repair and maintenance services for machinery and equipment. In addition, it is involved in the service of infrastructure and systems. The company primarily serves government agencies. Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

UOBKH-R.BK.long_name: UOB Kay Hian Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited
UOBKH-R.BK.summary: UOB Kay Hian Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the securities brokerage, dealing, and derivatives business in Thailand. The company operates in three segments: Securities and Derivatives Business, Financial Advisory Business, and Investing Business. It offers securities brokerage, trading, and underwriting, derivatives agent, securities borrowing and lending, and investment advisory service. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. UOB Kay Hian Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of UOB-Kay Hian Holdings Limited.

UP.BK.summary: Union Plastic Public Company Limited manufactures and sells thermoplastics in Thailand. The company offers various plastic parts, including automotive parts, electrical appliances, household products, and vacuum bottles; and plastic injection molds comprising automotive parts, electrical appliances, painting on plastic parts, and others. It also provides contract manufacturing and repair services for molds; and technical support services, including design assistance, material selection, and packaging concepts. Union Plastic Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UPA-R.BK.short_name: UNITED POWER OF ASIA PUBLIC COM
UPA-R.BK.long_name: United Power of Asia Public Company Limited
UPA-R.BK.summary: United Power of Asia Public Company Limited engages in the electricity generation and property development activities in Thailand.
