UPF-R.BK.summary: Union Pioneer Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes finished elastic products in Thailand, the United States, and internationally. The company offers rubber tapes for use in swimwear, sportwear, active wear, underwear, and innerwear; rim of pants' legs for gentlemen; medical and health care products; and furniture industry. It also provides rubber threads for use in the rims of baby and adult diaper's legs and waist; the rims of legs for gentlemen; swimming suits; and the rims of shower cap and swimming caps, as well as exercise bands. In addition, the company offers elastic braids for consumer and industrial textile applications; and elastic webbing and covering yarn products that are used as components of the underwear for gentlemen and ladies, general clothes for children and adults, warming suits, sportswear, healthy products using elastic, and tapes for flasks and bags. Further, it provides medical devices, such as Esmark and elastic bandages, as well as tourniquet for disposable or single use; and FITbands for exercise. The company offers its products under the VENUS brand. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Union Pioneer Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Saha-Union Public Company Limited.

UPOIC-R.BK.summary: United Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and sells crude palm oil and palm kernel oil in Thailand. It also holds concessions to use forest reserve land. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. UREKA-R.BK.summary: Eureka Design Public Company Limited designs, manufactures, and sells machinery for the automotive and other industries in Thailand, India, and internationally. It operates in five segments: Design Manufacture and Installation of Semi - Automatic Machine; Design Manufacture and Installation of Automatic Machine; Installation and Maintenance of Machine; Manufacture of Pesticides and Agrochemical Products; and Others. The company offers industrial machines, such as washing, test, tightening, press, assembly, measuring, machining, and marking machines; agricultural machines; and leak test, Skysaver, vacuum lifter, and food machines. It also provides part feeders, auto load equipment, collaborative robots, and industrial robots; stacker cranes, carriers, and shuttles; chillers; robotics for logistics; and CCTV products. In addition, the company is involved in the retail business; sale of equipment and tools; design, production, and sale of machining jigs and parts; manufacture and sale of pesticides and agrochemical products, and water; production of raw water; and manufacture and sale of energy. Eureka Design Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

Union Textile Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company offers Kraft liner boards and Kraft paper for making corrugating medium papers. It also exports its products. United Paper Public Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UV-R.BK.summary: Univentures Public Company Limited engages in the property development business in Thailand. It develops and sells condominiums, as well as rents office buildings. The company also manufactures and sells zinc oxide and chemicals; and provides time recorders, parking control equipment, and electronics equipment. Further, the company operates as a manager of trusts for real estate investments; and invests in energy services, hotel, and other companies. Additionally, it acts as a broker and agent in real estate-related business; and offers corporate registration services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. UVAN-R.BK.summary: Univanich Palm Oil Public Company Limited engages in the oil palm plantations, palm fruit processing, and oil palm seed and seedling businesses in Thailand. The company produces crude palm oil and crude palm kernel oil, which are ingredients in the manufacture of cooking oils, margarines, snack foods, dairy substitutes, soaps, and cosmetics. It also operates electric power plant with methane capture biogas project. The company also exports its products. Univanich Palm Oil Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Krabi, Thailand.

UWC-R.BK.summary: Ua Withya Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes galvanized steel structures, electricity poles, telecommunication poles, and electricity sub-stations in Thailand. The company also provides galvanizing services; and distributes power transmission equipment. In addition, it is involved in the operation of biomass, solar, and biogas power plants. Further, the company manufactures and sells agricultural products and woodchips, as well as sells industrial products. Ua Withya Public Company Limited was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

VARO-R.BK.summary: Varopakorn Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes semi-finished aluminum products in Thailand, Asia, and Oceania. The company offers a range of products, including automotive and precoated finstocks used for the manufacturing of radiator fins, intercoolers, condensers, and evaporator units in the automotive industry; bare finstocks used to produce screens for heat ventilation in air conditioners; and cap stocks that are used for the fabrication of pilfer-proof caps for energy drinks, electrolyte beverages, liquid medicines, whisky cap, etc. It also provides foils used as raw material in the construction industry; and aluminum sheets and coils, which are used in the manufacturing of various products, such as satellite dishes, traffic signs, plate eyelets, and rolled bonds used in the production of freezers for refrigerators. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

VCOM-R.BK.summary: Vintcom Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in computers and equipment in Thailand, Myanmar, Cambodia, and internationally. It operates through Sale of Goods and Rendering of Services segments. The company also provides software and related services for computers. In addition, it offers various information technology solutions and services, such as servers, storage units, engineered systems or converged infrastructure solutions, cybers security, networking devices, database systems, operating systems, virtualization systems, middleware, software development tools, and database management software for data integration, big data management, cloud data management, and data quality and security. Further, the company provides installation, consultation, and computer system maintenance services; professional services; computer and network security monitoring, and outsourced management services to protect the digital infrastructures of enterprises; and installed-based renewal and project management services. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Vintcom Technology Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vnet Capital Co., Ltd.

VGI.BK.summary: VGI Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides integrated offline-to-online solutions for clients in Thailand. It operates through four segments: BTS, Outdoor, Digital Service, and Other. The company engages in the arrangement and provision of advertising services in BTS stations, inside BTS trains, on BTS train bodies, in office buildings, and in department stores. It also rents retail space at BTS stations; invests in securities; and provides electronic payment services for mass transit system and retail stores. In addition, the company offers outdoor advertising media services; electronic money and payment services through various devices or networks, as well as bill payment services; a web portal service under the Rabbit Daily name, which includes websites and articles, as well as web pages space rental services; design and arrangement services of various e-commerce-related activities, including online marketing services; and online insurance price comparison services under the Rabbit Finance name. Further, it provides direct sale services for various types of products through telesales, such as contacting prospective buyers of insurance and following up with existing customers with policies that are close to expiration. Additionally, the company engages in the production and sale of tri-vision equipment, advertising media, and billboards; and provision of advertising services through the supply of tree wall-panel. The company was formerly known as VGI Global Media Public Company Limited and changed its name to VGI Public Company Limited in August 2019. VGI Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. VGI Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bangkok Mass Transit System Public Company Limited.

The company provides medical services; and room rental and hotel services. In addition, it engages in the beauty business. Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

VIH-R.BK.summary: Srivichaivejvivat Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates hospitals in Thailand. Its medical services include treatment for the various heart disease, such as coronary artery bypass grafting, valvular repair/replacement, and congenital heart disease correction; various health check-up programs; services related to child development; various emergency services; and orthopedic service related to joint pain, hip pain, knee pain, trigger finger, hand pain, elbow or shoulder pain, etc. The company also provides treatment for cardiovascular disease, neurological and brain, allergy, cancer, respiratory diseases and lung, urinary tract and liver, sports injury, woman and occupational disease, digestive disease, and diabetes and endocrine, as well as blood, kidneys, and skin; and general radiography, fluoroscopy, computed tomography scanning services. In addition, it offers occupational therapy, elderly, and pediatric rehabilitation services, as well as rehabilitation services of patients with spinal cord injury, bone and joint, back pain, neck pain, shoulder pain, heart disease, cancer disease, and neuropathy; and services related to diagnosing bone and muscle abnormalities. Further, the company provides gastrointestinal, neurological, plastic, urology, orthopedics, laparoscopic, and cardiac surgery, as well as staple hemorrhoidectomy; treatment for ear, nose, and throat, such as otitis, sinusitis, etc.; hemodialysis procedure that cleans and filters the blood; dialysis services; anti-aging services; treatment for eye diseases; dermatological and dental services; medical treatment with traditional Chinese medicine; maternal and child care services. It also operates a vocational school. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Krathum Baen, Thailand.

VNG-R.BK.summary: Vanachai Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes wood plates, MDF boards, particle boards, and doorskin and melamine on wood plates in Thailand and internationally. The company's products include laminated flooring, laminated particleboards, and laminated veneer. It also manufactures glue and melamine impregnated paper products, and resin, as well as veneer on MDF boards; and generates electricity from biomass. The company was formerly known as MDF Planner Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Vanachai Group Public Company Limited. The company was founded in 1943 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Vanachai Group Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vanachai Group of Companies Co., Ltd.

VNT-R.BK.summary: Vinythai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes polyvinyl chloride (PVC) and vinyl chloride monomer in Thailand, India, South Korea, Vietnam, China, Malaysia, Taiwan, Bangladesh, Indonesia, the United States, and internationally. It operates in two segments, Vinyl and Biochemical. The company provides PVC resins, such as suspension and paste PVC resins under the Siamvic name for automotive, building and construction, electrical and electronics, consumer goods, packaging, and healthcare industries; caustic soda; hydrogen and sodium hypochlorite; and bio-based Epichlorohydrin for automotive, aerospace, and wind turbine industries. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand. Vinythai Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of AGC Inc.

VPO-R.BK.summary: Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited produces and distributes crude palm oil and kernel products in Thailand. It offers crude palm oil for palm oil refineries in to be used in the food business, such as the production of biscuits, creamer, and ice cream, as well as for shampoo manufacturing industry and used in the production of fatty acid and methyl ester. The company also provides palm kernel oils and fats, used as ingredients in the production of margarine, bread, cosmetics, and health supplements; raw materials for oleo chemicals industry; and ingredient in animal food. In addition, it offers by products, such as shells, empty bunches, decanter cakes, and palm fiber products. Further, the company is also involved in energy production by using waste water of the palm oil and biogas-powered fuel. Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It also exports its products to Japan, the United States, and the ASEAN countries. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WACOAL.BK.summary: Thai Wacoal Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells finished garments. The company offers ladies' lingerie under the Wacoal, WIENNA, B'me, Sgarlet, Presea, and CW-X brands; ladies' outerwear under the 5.up, RacÃ©, and ERAWAN UNIFORMS & WORKWEAR brands; and children wear under the ENFANT, De bon, Amusant, Little Wacoal, ELLE PETITE, and ELLE POUPON brands. It also exports its products to Japan, the United States, and the ASEAN countries. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WAVE.BK.summary: Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of television programs in Thailand. It also operates an English language institution that provides English language courses and services for adult learners under the name under the Wall Street English name; and restaurants under the Jeffer Steak & Seafood name. In addition, the company is involved in the operation of concerts and events; sale of food and beverage, as well as provision of marketing activities. Further, it provides equipment for entertainment events; installs light and sound systems; prepares, installs, and removed advertising boards; advisory, research data analysis, and survey of statistic services; advertising ,event, and public relations services; and designs, produces, and distributes publishing media. The company was formerly known as CVD Entertainment Public Company Limited and changed its name to Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited in April 2009. Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WGE-R.BK.long_name: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited
WGE-R.BK.summary: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited operates as a construction contractor in Thailand. It provides turnkey commercial and residential construction services, as well as related technical consultancy services for engineering and architecture sectors. It also offers after sales service, including warranties and claims, and maintenance to its customers. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

WGE.BK.long_name: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited
WGE.BK.summary: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited operates as a construction contractor in Thailand. It provides turnkey commercial and residential construction services, as well as related technical consultancy services for engineering and architecture sectors. It also offers after sales service, including warranties and claims, and maintenance to its customers. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

WHA.BK.summary: WHA Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, rents, and sells lands, buildings, factories, warehouses, and other properties in Thailand and internationally. It engages in the development and management of properties in industrial estates and zones. The company also provides digital services, data center, Internet connection, and other IT services; raw and industrial water services; and wastewater treatment services. In addition, it offers consulting, general and service management, property investment, marina, design and construction supervision, pipe pack rental, renewable energy investment and development, and water resources development and management services. WHA Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bang Kaeo, Thailand.

WHABT.BK.long_name: WHA Business Complex Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
WHABT.BK.summary: WHA Business Complex Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust specializes in real estate investing.

WHART.BK.long_name: WHA Premium Growth Freehold And Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
WHART.BK.summary: WHA Premium Growth Freehold And Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust externally managed by WHA Real Estate Management Company Limited. The firm invests mostly in property or property leasehold rights and generate benefit from such properties including to improve, alter, develop or dispose other assets in which the Trust invest or possess whatsoever lease, sub-lease or sale or other process for the benefit of the property and create the revenue and return to the Trust and the unitholders. WHA Premium Growth Freehold And Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust was formed on December 8, 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

WHAUP-R.BK.long_name: WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited
WHAUP-R.BK.summary: WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited provides integrated utilities products and services in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Water Business, Power Business, and Holding Company. It procures and distributes raw water; produces and distributes industrial water; and provides wastewater treatment services to operators in industrial estates and industrial lands, as well as other consumers. The company also generates and distributes electricity. It has a total generation capacity of approximately 2,619 megawatts (MW) that utilize gas, coal, water, solar, and waste to energy. The company was formerly known as Hemaraj Clean Water Company Limited and changed its name to WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited in August 2016. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Samut Prakarn, Thailand. WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of WHA Industrial Development Public Company Limited.

WHAUP.BK.long_name: WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited

WICE-R.BK.summary: Wice Logistics Public Company Limited provides air and sea freight forwarding, customs brokerage, inland transportation, cross-border and multimodal transportation, warehousing, and various freight related services for imports and exports in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Sea Freight, Air Freight, Cross Border Service, and Logistics segments. The company transports sea freight, including full container load and less than container load services for various forwarders and containers; and offers air freight services. It also provides customs clearance services, including duty intensive consultation; internal transportation services using trailer and dump trucks, lorries, or minivans from pick up point to the port; and warehouse storage services, such as multi user and dedicated warehouses, and warehouse management. The company was formerly known as Wice Freight Services (Thailand) Company Limited and changed its name to Wice Logistics Public Company Limited in April 2015. Wice Logistics Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WIIK-R.BK.summary: WIIK Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes high density polyethylene (HDPE) pipes and related fittings, low density polyethylene pipes, polypropylene pipes, polybutylene pipes, and Weholite spiro pipes in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Polyethylene Pipe and Fittings Business, and Water Management Business. The company offers polyethylene pipes for potable water and water supply systems, transmission lines, distribution systems, drainages, sewage and storm water systems, and conduits primarily for use in governmental and private sectors; structured wall HDPE pipes that are used in municipal, industrial, road, and marine pipeline applications; and HDPE tanks for water storage. It also provides HDPE pipe welding and installation services; and consultancy, advisory, and servicing of HDPE pipe installation. In addition, the company engages in the water management and distribution business, as well as designs, constructs, and operates water supply systems. Further, it operates tap water production business with ultra-filtration and reverse osmosis systems. The company was formerly known as Wiik & Hoeglund Public Company Limited and changed its name to WIIK Public Company Limited in December 2019. WIIK Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WIN-R.BK.long_name: Wyncoast Industrial Park Public Company Limited
WIN-R.BK.summary: Wyncoast Industrial Park Public Company Limited sells and rents custom duty free zone areas for the commercial and industrial activities worldwide. The company's facilities include customs office at site, logistics solution teams, executive offices, staff accommodations, conference rooms, and food centers. Its total land area is 109,174 square meters with factory and warehouse buildings for rent of 42,754 square meters, depot area of 15,175 square meters, and a three-storey office building of 4,011 square meters. The company also operates as an auto dealer for new, old, and multipurpose cars; and other vehicles, as well as spare parts and accessories. In addition, it produces and distributes electricity from solar energy; produces and distributes water; and operates and manages properties and assets, as well as engages in the construction business. The company was formerly known as Capetronic International (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Wyncoast Industrial Park Public Company Limited in October 2013. Wyncoast Industrial Park Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Bang Pakong, Thailand.

WINNER-R.BK.long_name: Winner Group Enterprise Public Company Limited
WINNER-R.BK.summary: Winner Group Enterprise Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, imports, and distributes raw materials, ingredients, food chemicals, and consumer products in Thailand. It offers cocoa butter, liquor, and powder; couverture and compound chocolate; chocolate chips, spreads, and fillings; raisins, cranberries, cashew nuts, almonds, and rolled oats; egg white, egg yolk, and whole egg powders; popcorns, cooking papers, and pumpkin powder; margarine and shortening; seasoning products; icing, ground, and donut sugar; glazing powder, maltodextrin, dextrose, aspatame, acesulfame K, and sucralose; potato, modified, wheat, and corn starch; wheat flour and gluten; potato granules; whipping creams; and bread improvers, yeasts, and baking powders. The company also provides carboxy methyl cellulose, carrageenan, gellan gum, pectin, and xanthan gum; potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, and phosphate preservatives; powder drink; baking ingredients; and batter mix, pancake mix, and creamy custard powder. In addition, it offers frozen and chilled products, comprising of fruits and vegetables, French fries, meat and seafood, cheese, and bakery products. The company also offers consumer food products, such as microwave popcorn, granular bars, seasoned laver, pasta, olive oil, fruit jams, juices, etc., as well as semi-processed raw materials and frozen products, gourmet foods and bakeries, and beverages and drinks under the Bel Normande, Clos Pons, Campagna, Castella, EL Avion, Golden Pot, Gemez Suki, Harvey Fresh, Ital Lemon, Kimnori, Langers, Le Sang Des Seigneurs, La Espanola, Ohigya, Osterberg, Olivia, Pearl River Bridge, Pop Secret, Pons, Romulo, Reggia, Streamline, Sea Friend, Serpis, Teekane, VFOODS, and Yummyto brands. In addition, it manufactures skincare and cosmetic products, makeup, supplementary foods, and pharmaceuticals. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

In addition, it manufactures skincare and cosmetic products, makeup, supplementary foods, and pharmaceuticals. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WORK-R.BK.summary: Workpoint Entertainment Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the digital television broadcasting activities in Thailand. The company is also involved in the production of television programs and movies; editing and sound recording; and provision of event organizing and theater management services, as well as animation, computer graphics, concerts and plays, and event marketing businesses. In addition, it trades in goods and renders services. Workpoint Entertainment Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

WP.BK.summary: WP Energy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) under the World Gas brand name. The company operates through Sale of LPG and Transportation segments. It distributes LPG cylinder to the LPG gas filling plants, retail gas distributors, and industrial and household users, as well as offers specialized LPG cylinders for forklift trucks. The company also transports oil, gas, and chemical substances; operates gas station; produces and distributes electricity; and leases vehicles. WP Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

WPH-R.BK.long_name: Wattanapat Hospital Trang Public Company Limited
WPH-R.BK.summary: Wattanapat Hospital Trang Public Company Limited owns and operates hospitals and clinics in Thailand. The company offers medical services in the field of hemodialysis, surgery, gynecology, delivery and newborn, clinical pediatrics, skin and beauty, dental clinic, physical therapy clinic, and ophthalmology, as well as ear, nose, and throat; and operates dialysis, X-ray, MRI, and wellness centers. It serves people through its 120-bed hospital. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Trang, Thailand.

It serves people through its 120-bed hospital. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Trang, Thailand.

XBLA.F.long_name: Bangkok Life Assurance Public Company Limited
XBLA.F.summary: Bangkok Life Assurance Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides life insurance services to individuals and corporates in Thailand. Its life insurance products include protection, savings, education, pension, accident plans, total permanent disability, and health and critical illness products. The company also provides general insurance products comprise personal insurance and business all risks insurance products, including fire, motor, burglary, personal accident, accident and personal health, travel accident, cancer, golfer's indemnity, home multicover, medical malpractice liability, bail bond, business interruption, marine, hull, workmen's compensation, money, contractors' plant and equipment, contractors' all risks, erection all risks, boiler and pressure vessel, electronic equipment, industrial all risks, public liability, neon-sign, plate glass, fidelity guarantee, group accident and health, and shop multicover insurance products. In addition, it offers bancassurance products; and equity, long term equity, mixed, foreign investment, fixed income, exchange traded, money market, local fixed income, and retirement mutual funds. Bangkok Life Assurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

XO-R.BK.summary: Exotic Food Public Company Limited manufactures, trades, and exports various food products in Europe, Australia, Asia, and internationally. The company's products include dipping and cooking marinate sauces, salad dressing and oils, wok sauce, cooking pastes, cooking essentials, herbs and spices, fruits and vegetables, heat and serve, noodles, stir fry sauces and curry sauce, snacks, and Japanese range of products, as well as seasonings, fruit juices, and canned products. It offers its products under the Exotic Food, Thai Pride, and Coco-Loto brands. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

XO.BK.summary: Exotic Food Public Company Limited manufactures, trades, and exports various food products in Europe, Australia, Asia, and internationally. The company's products include dipping and cooking marinate sauces, salad dressing and oils, wok sauce, cooking pastes, cooking essentials, herbs and spices, fruits and vegetables, heat and serve, noodles, stir fry sauces and curry sauce, snacks, and Japanese range of products, as well as seasonings, fruit juices, and canned products. It offers its products under the Exotic Food, Thai Pride, and Coco-Loto brands. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

Y92.SI.summary: Thai Beverage Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, and food products in Thailand, Vietnam, and internationally. The company operates through Spirits, Beer, Non-Alcoholic Beverages, and Food segments. It offers liquor, beer, malt, and yeast products; spirits, including brown spirits, white spirits, herbs, and other products; and non-alcoholic beverages comprising drinking and soda water, electrolyte beverages, energy drinks, green and herbal tea, ready-to-drink coffee, carbonated soft drinks, isotonics, soya drinks, Asian and sparkling drinks, cordials, pasteurized milk, UHT milk, sterilized milk, yoghurt, canned milk, pasteurized juice, ready-to-drink juice, ice cream, and cereal bars. The company also provides chilled and frozen, and canned food products; and fertilizers and feeds, bricks, and oak barrels. In addition, it is involved in the trading of molasses; provision of transportation and distribution, logistics, advertising and marketing, consultancy, asset and brands management, public cold storage, and human resources and organization development services; operation of Japanese restaurants, bakeries, and social enterprise; and production and distribution of biogas. Further, the company is involved in the trading of bottles and supplies; wholesale and distribution of beverages; and production of cartons, and metal and plastic packaging businesses. Additionally, it engages in asset management activities; e-commerce business; development, rental, and investment in properties; mechanical equipment manufacturing; warehousing business; trading of chemical and packaging materials; manufacture of equipment used in food manufacturing; and installation and maintenance of machinery system and equipment. Thai Beverage Public Company Limited was founded in 2003 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

YGG-R.BK.summary: Yggdrazil Group Public Company Limited provides visual effect, animation, and VR studio services. It offers rendering services to produce computer graphics for advertisements, music videos, and movies, as well as to produce animation. The company provides post production and production support services for commercials and feature films, as well as game, cinematic, and TV series. It has operations in Thailand, Singapore, the People's Republic of China, and internationally. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

YTAA.F.long_name: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited
YTAA.F.summary: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes natural rubber products in Thailand, China, the United States, Singapore, Japan, and internationally. The company operates in four segments: Natural Rubber Products, Gloves, and Other Businesses. The Natural Rubber Products segment manufactures, sells, and trade in ribbed smoked sheets, concentrated latex, and block rubbers. The Gloves segment manufactures and sells powdered and powderfree latex examination gloves. The Other Businesses segment engages in the plantation activities, such as rubber, palm, trees, and temperate fruits; and manufacture and sale of escalator handrails, rubber injection-moulded goods, and high-pressure hydraulic hoses. This segment also offers engineering services that include research and development of machinery and production processes, as well as information system services; and logistics and other services. It also offers processed rubber wood and medical gloves; and information technology service. Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hat Yai, Thailand.

YUASA-R.BK.summary: Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes batteries for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand. The company also offers industrial batteries. It markets its products under the YUASA brand name, as well as under private brands, such as THUNDERLITE and YUCON. The company serves original and replacement equipment markets. It also exports its products. The company is headquartered in Samutprakan, Thailand.

YUASA.BK.summary: Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes batteries for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand. The company also offers industrial batteries. It markets its products under the YUASA brand name, as well as under private brands, such as THUNDERLITE and YUCON. The company serves original and replacement equipment markets. It also exports its products. The company is headquartered in Samutprakan, Thailand.

ZEN.BK.long_name: ZEN Corporation Group Public Company Limited
ZEN.BK.summary: ZEN Corporation Group Public Company Limited operates restaurants in Thailand and internationally. It operates restaurants under the ZEN, ZENBOX, AKA, Musha, Tetsu, Sushi Cyu, On the Table, Din's, Foo Flavor, Tummour, Pho, Laos Yuan, De Tummour, Jaew Hon, and Khiang brand names. The company is also involved in the retail of ready-to-cook and ready-to-eat food products. In addition, it offers delivery services through online channels; catering services for various events, such as weddings, company parties, and birthday parties; and restaurant management and restaurant consultancy services for restaurant operators or franchisees. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 345 restaurant branches. ZEN Corporation Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ZIGA-R.BK.summary: Ziga Innovation Public Company Limited manufactures and trades in steel conduits for electrical wiring systems in Thailand. It also provides steel pipings for construction and real estate businesses. The company was formerly known as Daiwa Industry Company Limited and changed its name to Ziga Innovation Public Company Limited in February 2016. Ziga Innovation Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Samut Prakarn, Thailand.

ZMICO-R.BK.summary: Seamico Capital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. The company offers securities brokerage, securities and derivatives trading, investment advisory, securities underwriting, financial advisory, derivatives agency, online securities trading, securities borrowing and lending, wealth advisory, international market securities trading, and derivative warrants, as well as mutual, private, and provident fund management services. It is also involved in the foreign exchange business. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
